word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ τὴν ἰσχὺν αὐτοῦ καὶ ἀνδραγαθίαν πλοῦτόν τε καὶ δόξαν τῆς βασιλείας αὐτοῦ ἰδοὺ γέγραπται ἐν βιβλίῳ βασιλέων περσῶν καὶ μήδων εἰς μνημόσυνον

word.kjv: And the LORD said unto Satan, Behold, all that he hath is in thy power; only upon himself put not forth thine hand. So Satan went forth from the presence of the LORD.
word.thailand: และพระเยโฮวาห์ตรัสกับซาตานว่า "ดูเถิด บรรดาสิ่งที่เขามีอยู่ก็อยู่ในอำนาจของเจ้า เพียงแต่อย่ายื่นมือแตะต้องตัวเขาเท่านั้น" ซาตานจึงออกไปจากพระพักตร์ของพระเยโฮวาห์
word.spanish1909: Y dijo Jehová á Satán: He aquí, todo lo que tiene está en tu mano: solamente no pongas tu mano sobre él. Y salióse Satán de delante de Jehová.
word.latinvulgate: Dixit ergo Dominus ad Satan : Ecce universa quæ habet in manu tua sunt ; tantum in eum ne extendas manum tuam. Egressusque est Satan a facie Domini.
word.italian1927: E l’Eterno disse a Satana: "Ebbene! tutto quello che possiede e in tuo potere; soltanto, non stender la mano sulla sua persona". E Satana si ritirò dalla presenza dell’Eterno.
word.german1912: Der HERR sprach zum Satan: Siehe, alles, was er hat, sei in deiner Hand; nur an ihn selbst lege deine Hand nicht. Da ging der Satan aus von dem HERRN.
word.french1910: L'Eternel dit à Satan: Voici, tout ce qui lui appartient, je te le livre; seulement, ne porte pas la main sur lui. Et Satan se retira de devant la face de l'Eternel.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華對撒但說：“好吧，他所有的一切都交在你手中，只是不可以伸手害他。”於是撒但從耶和華面前退去。
word.korean: 여호와께서 사단에게 이르시되 내가 그의 소유물을 다 네 손에 붙이노라 오직 그의 몸에는 네 손을 대지 말지니라 ! 사단이 곧 여호와 앞에서 물러가니라
word.tagalog: At sinabi ng Panginoon kay Satanas, Narito, lahat niyang tinatangkilik ay nangasa iyong kapangyarihan; siya lamang ang huwag mong pagbuhatan ng iyong kamay. Sa gayo'y lumabas si Satanas na mula sa harapan ng Panginoon.
word.maori: Ano ra ko Ihowa ki a Hatana, Nana, ko ana mea katoa kei tou ringa, kaua ia tou ringa e totoro ki a ia. Heoi haere atu ana a Hatana i te aroaro o Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Ug si Jehova miingon kang Satanas: Ania karon, ang tanan nga anaa kaniya anaa sa imong kamot; ugaling ayaw lamang pagtanduga siya sa iyang kaugalingon. Busa milakaw si Satanas gikan sa atubangan ni Jehova.
word.hebrew: יב ויאמר יהוה אל השטן הנה כל אשר לו בידך--רק אליו אל תשלח ידך ויצא השטן מעם פני יהוה
word.hebrewmodern: ויאמר יהוה אל השטן הנה כל אשר לו בידך רק אליו אל תשלח ידך ויצא השטן מעם פני יהוה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: τότε εἶπεν ὁ κύριος τῷ διαβόλῳ ἰδοὺ πάντα ὅσα ἔστιν αὐτῷ δίδωμι ἐν τῇ χειρί σου ἀλλὰ αὐτοῦ μὴ ἅψῃ καὶ ἐξῆλθεν ὁ διάβολος παρὰ τοῦ κυρίου

word.kjv: In famine he shall redeem thee from death: and in war from the power of the sword.
word.thailand: ในคราวกันดารอาหาร พระองค์จะทรงไถ่ท่านออกจากความตาย และในการสงคราม จากอานุภาพของดาบ
word.spanish1909: En el hambre te redimirá de la muerte, Y en la guerra de las manos de la espada.
word.latinvulgate: In fame eruet te de morte, et in bello de manu gladii.
word.italian1927: In tempo di carestia ti scamperà dalla morte, in tempo di guerra dai colpi della spada.
word.german1912: in der Teuerung wird er dich vom Tod erlösen und im Kriege von des Schwertes Hand;
word.french1910: Il te sauvera de la mort pendant la famine, Et des coups du glaive pendant la guerre.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 在饑荒中，他必救你脫離死亡；在戰爭中，他必救你脫離刀劍的權勢。
word.korean: 기근 때에 죽음에서, 전쟁 때에 칼 권세에서 너를 구속하실 터인즉
word.tagalog: Sa kagutom ay tutubusin ka niya sa kamatayan; at sa pagdidigma ay sa kapangyarihan ng tabak.
word.maori: I te matekai ka hokona koe e ia kei mate; i te tatauranga ano, kei pangia e te hoari.
word.cebuano: Sa tinggutom magaluwas siya kanimo gikan sa kamatayon; Ug sa gubat gikan sa kagahum sa espada.
word.hebrew: כ  ברעב פדך ממות    ובמלחמה מידי חרב
word.hebrewmodern: ברעב פדך ממות ובמלחמה מידי חרב׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἐν λιμῷ ῥύσεταί σε ἐκ θανάτου ἐν πολέμῳ δὲ ἐκ χειρὸς σιδήρου λύσει σε

word.kjv: Wherefore do the wicked live, become old, yea, are mighty in power?
word.thailand: ทำไมคนชั่วจึงมีชีวิตอยู่ เออ จนถึงแก่ และเจริญมีกำลังมากขึ้น
word.spanish1909: ¿Por qué viven los impíos, Y se envejecen, y aun crecen en riquezas?
word.latinvulgate: Quare ergo impii vivunt, sublevati sunt, confortatique divitiis ?
word.italian1927: Perché mai vivono gli empi? Perché arrivano alla vecchiaia ed anche crescon di forze?
word.german1912: Warum leben denn die Gottlosen, werden alt und nehmen zu an Gütern?
word.french1910: Pourquoi les méchants vivent-ils? Pourquoi les voit-on vieillir et accroître leur force?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 惡人反得福樂惡人為甚麼總可以存活，活到老，而且財勢強大？
word.korean: 어찌하여 악인이 살고 수를 누리고 세력이 강하냐 ?
word.tagalog: Bakit nabubuhay ang masama, nagiging matanda, oo, nagiging malakas ba sa kapangyarihan?
word.maori: ¶ He aha te hunga kino i ora ai, i koroheke ai, ae, i marohirohi ai to ratou kaha?
word.cebuano: Ngano man nga ang mga dautan nagapadayon sa kinabuhi, Moabut sa kagulangon, oo, magatubo sa dakung kagahum?
word.hebrew: ז  מדוע רשעים יחיו    עתקו גם-גברו חיל
word.hebrewmodern: מדוע רשעים יחיו עתקו גם גברו חיל׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: διὰ τί ἀσεβεῖς ζῶσιν πεπαλαίωνται δὲ καὶ ἐν πλούτῳ

word.kjv: Will he plead against me with his great power? No; but he would put strength in me.
word.thailand: พระองค์จะทรงโต้แย้งกับข้าด้วยฤทธานุภาพอันยิ่งใหญ่ของพระองค์หรือ เปล่าน่ะ พระองค์จะทรงให้กำลังแก่ข้า
word.spanish1909: ¿Pleitearía conmigo con grandeza de fuerza? No: antes él la pondría en mí.
word.latinvulgate: Nolo multa fortitudine contendat mecum, nec magnitudinis suæ mole me premat.
word.italian1927: Contenderebbe egli meco con la sua gran potenza? No! invece, mi presterebbe attenzione.
word.german1912: Will er mit großer Macht mit mir rechten? Er stelle sich nicht so gegen mich,
word.french1910: Emploierait-il toute sa force à me combattre? Ne daignerait-il pas au moins m'écouter?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他會以大能與我相爭嗎？必不會這樣，他必關懷我。
word.korean: 그가 큰 권능을 가지시고 나로 더불어 다투실까 아니라 도리어 내 말을 들으시리라
word.tagalog: Makikipagtalo ba siya sa akin sa kalakhan ng kaniyang kapangyarihan? Hindi; kundi pakikinggan niya ako.
word.maori: E whakaputaina mai ranei tona kaha nui ina tautohetohe ki ahau? Kahore; engari ka whai whakaaro ia ki ahau.
word.cebuano: Makiglalis ba siya kanako uban nianang gidak-on sa iyang kagahum? Dili; hinonoa siya magapatalinghug kanako.
word.hebrew: ו  הברב-כח יריב עמדי    לא אך-הוא ישם בי
word.hebrewmodern: הברב כח יריב עמדי לא אך הוא ישם בי׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ εἰ ἐν πολλῇ ἰσχύι ἐπελεύσεταί μοι εἶτα ἐν ἀπειλῇ μοι οὐ χρήσεται

word.kjv: He draweth also the mighty with his power: he riseth up, and no man is sure of life.
word.thailand: เขาได้ทำลายคนที่มีกำลังด้วยอำนาจของตน เขาลุกขึ้น แล้วไม่มีใครมั่นใจเรื่องชีวิตของตน
word.spanish1909: Mas á los fuertes adelantó con su poder: Levantóse, y no se da por segura la vida.
word.latinvulgate: Detraxit fortes in fortitudine sua, et cum steterit, non credet vitæ suæ.
word.italian1927: Invece, Iddio con la sua forza prolunga i giorni dei prepotenti, i quali risorgono, quand’ormai disperavan della vita.
word.german1912: Aber Gott erhält die Mächtigen durch seine Kraft, daß sie wieder aufstehen, wenn sie am Leben verzweifelten.
word.french1910: Non! Dieu par sa force prolonge les jours des violents, Et les voilà debout quand ils désespéraient de la vie;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神卻用自己的能力延長強暴的人的性命，生命難保的仍然興起。
word.korean: 그러나 하나님이 그 권능으로 강한 자들을 보존시키시니 살기를 바라지 못할 자도 일어나는구나
word.tagalog: Inaagawan naman ng Dios ang may kaya sa pamamagitan ng kaniyang kapangyarihan: siya'y bumabangon na walang katiwasayan sa buhay.
word.maori: E kumea atu ana hoki e ia nga marohirohi ki tona kaha: ka whakatika ake ia, kahore he tangata e u ki te ora.
word.cebuano: Apan ang Dios sa iyang kagahum nagabantay sa mga gamhanan tungod sa iyang gahum; Iyang gipatindog kadtong walay katinoan sa iyang kinabuhi.
word.hebrew: כב  ומשך אבירים בכחו    יקום ולא-יאמין בחיין
word.hebrewmodern: ומשך אבירים בכחו יקום ולא יאמין בחיין׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: θυμῷ δὲ κατέστρεψεν ἀδυνάτους ἀναστὰς τοιγαροῦν οὐ μὴ πιστεύσῃ κατὰ τῆς ἑαυτοῦ ζωῆς

word.kjv: How hast thou helped him that is without power? how savest thou the arm that hath no strength?
word.thailand: "ท่านได้ช่วยผู้ไม่มีกำลังมากจริงหนอ ท่านได้ช่วยแขนที่ไม่มีแรงแล้วหนอ
word.spanish1909: ¿En qué ayudaste al que no tiene fuerza? ¿Has amparado al brazo sin fortaleza?
word.latinvulgate: Cujus adjutor es ? numquid imbecillis ? et sustentas brachium ejus qui non est fortis ?
word.italian1927: "Come hai bene aiutato il debole! Come hai sorretto il braccio senza forza!
word.german1912: Wie stehest du dem bei, der keine Kraft hat, hilfst dem, der keine Stärke in den Armen hat!
word.french1910: Comme tu sais bien venir en aide à la faiblesse! Comme tu prêtes secours au bras sans force!
word.chinesencvtraditional: “無能力的，你怎樣幫助他，膀臂無力的，你怎樣拯救他！
word.korean: 네가 힘 없는 자를 참 잘 도왔구나 기력 없는 팔을 참 잘 구원하였구나
word.tagalog: Paano mong tinulungan siya na walang kapangyarihan! Paano mong iniligtas ang kamay na walang lakas!
word.maori: He hapai pehea tau i te kahakore? He whakaora pehea tau i te ringa ngoikore?
word.cebuano: Giunsa nimo pagtabang siya nga walay gahum! Unsaon nimo pagluwas sa bukton nga walay kusog!
word.hebrew: ב  מה-עזרת ללא-כח    הושעת זרוע לא-עז
word.hebrewmodern: מה עזרת ללא כח הושעת זרוע לא עז׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: τίνι πρόσκεισαι ἢ τίνι μέλλεις βοηθεῖν πότερον οὐχ ᾧ πολλὴ ἰσχὺς καὶ ᾧ βραχίων κραταιός ἐστιν

word.kjv: He divideth the sea with his power, and by his understanding he smiteth through the proud.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงปราบทะเลให้สงบด้วยอานุภาพของพระองค์ พระองค์ทรงตีคนจองหองด้วยความเข้าพระทัยของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: El rompe la mar con su poder, Y con su entendimiento hiere la hinchazón suya.
word.latinvulgate: In fortitudine illius repente maria congregata sunt, et prudentia ejus percussit superbum.
word.italian1927: Con la sua forza egli solleva il mare, con la sua intelligenza ne abbatte l’orgoglio.
word.german1912: Von seiner Kraft wird das Meer plötzlich ungestüm, und durch seinen Verstand zerschmettert er Rahab.
word.french1910: Par sa force il soulève la mer, Par son intelligence il en brise l'orgueil.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他以能力攪動大海，以聰明擊傷拉哈伯。
word.korean: 그는 권능으로 바다를 흉용케 하시며 지혜로 라합을 쳐서 파하시며
word.tagalog: Kaniyang pinapag-iinalon ang dagat ng kaniyang kapangyarihan, at sa kaniyang kaalaman ay sinasaktan niya ang Rahab.
word.maori: Ko tona kaha hei whakakorikori i te moana, maru ana te whakakake i tona matauranga.
word.cebuano: Sa iyang kagahum gikutaw niya ang dagat, Ug pinaagi sa iyang salabutan ginadaug niya ang Rahab.
word.hebrew: יב  בכחו רגע הים    ובתובנתו (ובתבונתו) מחץ רהב
word.hebrewmodern: בכחו רגע הים ובתובנתו מחץ רהב׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἰσχύι κατέπαυσεν τὴν θάλασσαν ἐπιστήμῃ δὲ ἔτρωσε τὸ κῆτος

word.kjv: Lo, these are parts of his ways: but how little a portion is heard of him? but the thunder of his power who can understand?
word.thailand: ดูเถิด เหล่านี้เป็นเพียงพระราชกิจผิวเผินของพระองค์ เราได้ยินถึงพระองค์ก็เป็นเพียงเสียงกระซิบ ใครจะเข้าใจถึงฤทธิ์กัมปนาทอันเกรียงไกรของพระองค์ได้"
word.spanish1909: He aquí, estas son partes de sus caminos: ­Mas cuán poco hemos oído de él! Porque el estruendo de sus fortalezas, ¿quién lo detendrá?
word.latinvulgate: Ecce hæc ex parte dicta sunt viarum ejus : et cum vix parvam stillam sermonis ejus audierimus, quis poterit tonitruum magnitudinis illius intueri ?
word.italian1927: Ecco, questi non son che gli estremi lembi dell’azione sua. Non ce ne giunge all’orecchio che un breve sussurro; Ma il tuono delle sue potenti opere chi lo può intendere?"
word.german1912: Siehe, also geht sein Tun, und nur ein geringes Wörtlein davon haben wir vernommen. Wer will aber den Donner seiner Macht verstehen?
word.french1910: Ce sont là les bords de ses voies, C'est le bruit léger qui nous en parvient; Mais qui entendra le tonnerre de sa puissance?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 這些不過是他的作為的一點點，我們從他那裡所聽到的，是多麼的微小！他大能的雷聲誰能夠明白呢？”
word.korean: 이런 것은 그 행사의 시작점이요 우리가 그에게 대하여 들은 것도 심히 세미한 소리뿐이니라 그 큰 능력의 우뢰야 누가 능히 측량하랴
word.tagalog: Narito, ang mga ito ang mga gilid lamang ng kaniyang mga daan: at pagkarahan ng bulong na ating naririnig sa kaniya! Nguni't sinong makakaunawa ng kulog ng kaniyang kapangyarihan?
word.maori: Na, he pito enei no ona ara; ano te iti o te wahi ona e rangona ana! Ko te whatitiri ia o tona kaha, ko wai ka matau?
word.cebuano: Ania karon, kini bahin ra sa iyang kaagi: Ug pagkadiyutay rang hong-hong ang atong nabati mahitungod kaniya! Apan sa dalugdug sa iyang kagahum kinsa ang makatugkad?
word.hebrew: יד  הן-אלה קצות דרכו--    ומה-שמץ דבר נשמע-בו ורעם גבורתו    מי יתבונן
word.hebrewmodern: הן אלה קצות דרכו ומה שמץ דבר נשמע בו ורעם גבורתו מי יתבונן׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἰδοὺ ταῦτα μέρη ὁδοῦ αὐτοῦ καὶ ἐπὶ ἰκμάδα λόγου ἀκουσόμεθα ἐν αὐτῷ σθένος δὲ βροντῆς αὐτοῦ τίς οἶδεν ὁπότε ποιήσει

word.kjv: Behold, God exalteth by his power: who teacheth like him?
word.thailand: ดูเถิด พระเจ้าทรงสำแดงความยิ่งใหญ่ด้วยฤทธานุภาพของพระองค์ ผู้ใดเป็นผู้สั่งสอนเหมือนอย่างพระองค์เล่า
word.spanish1909: He aquí que Dios es excelso con su potencia; ¿Qué enseñador semejante á él?
word.latinvulgate: Ecce Deus excelsus in fortitudine sua, et nullus ei similis in legislatoribus.
word.italian1927: Vedi, Iddio è eccelso nella sua potenza; chi può insegnare come lui?
word.german1912: Siehe Gott ist zu hoch in seiner Kraft; wo ist ein Lehrer, wie er ist?
word.french1910: Dieu est grand par sa puissance; Qui saurait enseigner comme lui?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 勸約伯榮耀　神　神靠自己的能力高高在上，有誰像　神指教人呢？
word.korean: 북방에서는 금 빛이 나오나니 하나님께는 두려운 위엄이 있느니라
word.tagalog: Narito, ang Dios ay gumagawa ng mainam sa kaniyang kapangyarihan: sinong tagapagturo ang gaya niya?
word.maori: Nana, ko te Atua, ko tona kaha hei whakanui, ko wai te kaiwhakaako hei rite mona?
word.cebuano: Ania karon, gibuhat sa Dios sa pagkahataas uyamut tungod sa iyang kagahum: Kinsa ba ang magtutudlo nga sama kaniya?
word.hebrew: כב  הן-אל ישגיב בכחו    מי כמהו מורה
word.hebrewmodern: הן אל ישגיב בכחו מי כמהו מורה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἰδοὺ ὁ ἰσχυρὸς κραταιώσει ἐν ἰσχύι αὐτοῦ τίς γάρ ἐστιν κατ' αὐτὸν δυνάστης

word.kjv: Touching the Almighty, we cannot find him out: he is excellent in power, and in judgment, and in plenty of justice: he will not afflict.
word.thailand: องค์ผู้ทรงมหิทธิฤทธิ์นั้น เราจะค้นพบพระองค์ไม่ได้ พระองค์ใหญ่ยิ่งในเรื่องฤทธานุภาพ ความยุติธรรมและความเที่ยงธรรมอันมากยิ่ง พระองค์จะไม่ทรงฝ่าฝืน
word.spanish1909: El es Todopoderoso, al cual no alcanzamos, grande en potencia; Y en juicio y en multitud de justicia no afligirá.
word.latinvulgate: Digne eum invenire non possumus : magnus fortitudine, et judicio, et justitia : et enarrari non potest.
word.italian1927: l’Onnipotente noi non lo possiam scoprire. Egli è grande in forza, in equità, in perfetta giustizia; egli non opprime alcuno.
word.german1912: Den Allmächtigen aber können wir nicht finden, der so groß ist von Kraft; das Recht und eine gute Sache beugt er nicht.
word.french1910: Nous ne saurions parvenir jusqu'au Tout-Puissant, Grand par la force, Par la justice, par le droit souverain: Il ne répond pas!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 論到全能者，我們無法把他查出；他大有能力與公平，又滿有公義，他必不苦待人。
word.korean: 내가 환난 때와 전쟁과 격투의 날을 위하여 이것을 저축하였노라
word.tagalog: Tungkol sa Makapangyarihan sa lahat, hindi natin mauunawa; siya'y marilag sa kapangyarihan; at sa kahatulan at saganang kaganapan siya'y hindi pipighati.
word.maori: Ko te Kaha Rawa, e kore ia e taea te whakataki e tatou; hira rawa tona kaha; a e kore ia e tukino i tana whakarite whakawa, i te nui o te tika.
word.cebuano: Mahatungod sa Makagagahum, dili nato siya makita: Siya daku uyamut sa kagahum; Ug sa justicia ug sa madagayaon nga pagkamatarung siya dili magapaguol.
word.hebrew: כג  שדי לא-מצאנהו שגיא-כח    ומשפט ורב-צדקה לא יענה
word.hebrewmodern: שדי לא מצאנהו שגיא כח ומשפט ורב צדקה לא יענה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ οὐχ εὑρίσκομεν ἄλλον ὅμοιον τῇ ἰσχύι αὐτοῦ ὁ τὰ δίκαια κρίνων οὐκ οἴει ἐπακούειν αὐτόν

word.kjv: I will not conceal his parts, nor his power, nor his comely proportion.
word.thailand: เราจะไม่งดพูดถึงอวัยวะต่างๆของมัน หรือกำลังอันแข็งกล้าของมัน หรือโครงร่างอันดีของมัน
word.spanish1909: Yo no callaré sus miembros, Ni lo de sus fuerzas y la gracia de su disposición.
word.latinvulgate: Halitus ejus prunas ardere facit, et flamma de ore ejus egreditur.
word.italian1927: (H41-4) E non vo’ tacer delle sue membra, della sua gran forza, della bellezza della sua armatura.
word.german1912: 41:4 Dazu muß ich nun sagen, wie groß, wie mächtig und wohlgeschaffen er ist. {~}
word.french1910: Je veux encore parler de ses membres, Et de sa force, et de la beauté de sa structure.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 論到鱷魚的四肢和牠的力氣，以及美好的體態，我不能緘默不言。
word.korean: 여호와께서 욥의 모년에 복을 주사 처음 복보다 더 하게 하시니 그가 양 일만 사천과 약대 육천과 소 일천 겨리와 암나귀 일천을 두었고
word.tagalog: Hindi ako tatahimik tungkol sa kaniyang mga sangkap ng katawan, ni sa kaniya mang dakilang kapangyarihan, ni sa kaniya mang mainam na hugis.
word.maori: E kore e huna e ahau te korero mo ona wahi, mo tona kaha, mo te ataahua hoki o tona hanganga.
word.cebuano: Ako dili magahilum mahitungod sa iyang bukton, Ni sa iyang daku nga kakusog, ni sa iyang matahum nga panagway.
word.hebrew: יב  מנחיריו יצא עשן--    כדוד נפוח ואגמן
word.hebrewmodern: לא אחריש בדיו ודבר גבורות וחין ערכו׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἐκ μυκτήρων αὐτοῦ ἐκπορεύεται καπνὸς καμίνου καιομένης πυρὶ ἀνθράκων

word.kjv: Be thou exalted, LORD, in thine own strength: so will we sing and praise thy power.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ขอทรงเป็นที่ยกย่องเชิดชูในพระกำลังของพระองค์ ข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลายจะร้องเพลงสรรเสริญฤทธานุภาพของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Ensálzate, oh Jehová, con tu fortaleza: Cantaremos y alabaremos tu poderío.
word.latinvulgate: Circumdederunt me vituli multi ; tauri pingues obsederunt me.
word.italian1927: Innalzati, o Eterno, con la tua forza; noi canteremo e celebreremo la tua potenza.
word.german1912: HERR, erhebe dich in deiner Kraft, so wollen wir singen und loben deine Macht.
word.french1910: Lève-toi, Eternel, avec ta force! Nous voulons chanter, célébrer ta puissance.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！願你因自己的能力被尊崇，好讓我們歌唱，頌讚你的大能。
word.korean: 여호와여, 주의 능력으로 높임을 받으소서 ! 우리가 주의 권능을 노래하고 칭송하겠나이다
word.tagalog: Mataas ka, Oh Panginoon, sa iyong kalakasan: sa gayo'y aming aawitin at pupurihin ang iyong kapangyarihan.
word.maori: Kia whakanuia koe, e Ihowa, i runga i tou kaha: ka waiata matou, ka himene ki tou nui.
word.cebuano: Pagabayawon ka, Oh Jehova, diha sa imong kusog: Sa ingon niini kami magaawit ug magadayeg sa imong gahum.
word.hebrew: יג  כי תשיתמו שכם    במיתריך תכונן על-פניהם [ (Psalms 21:14) יד  רומה יהוה בעזך    נשירה ונזמרה גבורתך ]
word.hebrewmodern: רומה יהוה בעזך נשירה ונזמרה גבורתך׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: περιεκύκλωσάν με μόσχοι πολλοί ταῦροι πίονες περιέσχον με

word.kjv: Deliver my soul from the sword; my darling from the power of the dog.
word.thailand: ขอทรงช่วยจิตวิญญาณข้าพระองค์ให้พ้นจากดาบ ช่วยชีวิตข้าพระองค์จากฤทธิ์ของสุนัข
word.spanish1909: Libra de la espada mi alma; Del poder del perro mi única.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Libera l’anima mia dalla spada, l’unica mia, dalla zampa del cane;
word.german1912: Errette meine Seele vom Schwert, meine einsame von den Hunden!
word.french1910: Protège mon âme contre le glaive, Ma vie contre le pouvoir des chiens!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你搭救我的性命脫離刀劍，搭救我的生命脫離惡狗的爪。
word.korean: 내 영혼을 칼에서 건지시며 내 유일한 것을 개의 세력에서 구하소서
word.tagalog: Iligtas mo ang aking kaluluwa sa tabak; ang aking minamahal sa kapangyarihan ng aso.
word.maori: Whakaorangia toku wairua i te hoari, taku hoki e matenui nei i te kuri.
word.cebuano: Luwason mo ang akong kalag gikan sa espada, Ang akong minahal nga kinabuhi gikan sa gahum sa iro.
word.hebrew: כ  ואתה יהוה אל-תרחק    אילותי לעזרתי חושה
word.hebrewmodern: הצילה מחרב נפשי מיד כלב יחידתי׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version

word.kjv: The voice of the LORD is powerful; the voice of the LORD is full of majesty.
word.thailand: พระสุรเสียงของพระเยโฮวาห์ทรงฤทธานุภาพ พระสุรเสียงของพระเยโฮวาห์เต็มด้วยความสูงส่ง
word.spanish1909: Voz de Jehová con potencia; Voz de Jehová con gloria.
word.latinvulgate: Domine, eduxisti ab inferno animam meam ; salvasti me a descendentibus in lacum.
word.italian1927: La voce dell’Eterno è potente, la voce dell’Eterno è piena di maestà.
word.german1912: Die Stimme des HERRN geht mit Macht; die Stimme des HERRN geht herrlich.
word.french1910: La voix de l'Eternel est puissante, La voix de l'Eternel est majestueuse.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華的聲音大有能力，耶和華的聲音充滿威嚴。
word.korean: 여호와의 소리가 힘 있음이여 여호와의 소리가 위엄차도다
word.tagalog: Ang tinig ng Panginoon ay makapangyarihan; ang tinig ng Panginoon ay puspos ng kamahalan.
word.maori: Kaha tonu te reo o Ihowa; kororia tonu te reo o Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Ang tingog ni Jehova gamhanan, Ang tingog ni Jehova napuno sa pagkahalangdon.
word.hebrew: ד  קול-יהוה בכח    קול יהוה בהדר
word.hebrewmodern: קול יהוה בכח קול יהוה בהדר׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: κύριε ἀνήγαγες ἐξ ᾅδου τὴν ψυχήν μου ἔσωσάς με ἀπὸ τῶν καταβαινόντων εἰς λάκκον

word.kjv: I have seen the wicked in great power, and spreading himself like a green bay tree.
word.thailand: ข้าพเจ้าเห็นคนชั่วมีอำนาจมากยิ่ง และสูงเด่นอย่างต้นเขียวสดที่อยู่ในท้องถิ่นของมัน
word.spanish1909: Vi yo al impío sumamente ensalzado, Y que se extendía como un laurel verde.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Io ho veduto l’empio potente, e distendersi come albero verde sul suolo natìo;
word.german1912: Ich habe gesehen einen Gottlosen, der war trotzig und breitete sich aus und grünte wie ein Lorbeerbaum.
word.french1910: J'ai vu le méchant dans toute sa puissance; Il s'étendait comme un arbre verdoyant.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我曾看見強暴的惡人興旺，像樹木在本土茂盛。
word.korean: 내가 악인의 큰 세력을 본즉 그 본토에 선 푸른 나무의 무성함 같으나
word.tagalog: Aking nakita ang masama sa malaking kapangyarihan, at lumalaganap na gaya ng sariwang punong kahoy sa kaniyang lupang tinubuan.
word.maori: I kite ahau i te tangata kino e kake ana, e tautorotoro ana me te rakau matomato i tona oneone tupu.
word.cebuano: Nakita ko ang dautan nga anaa sa dakung gahum, Ug nagalambo siya sa iyang kaugalingon sama sa usa ka kahoy nga lunhaw diha sa iyang natugkan nga yuta.
word.hebrew: לה  ראיתי רשע עריץ    ומתערה כאזרח רענן
word.hebrewmodern: ראיתי רשע עריץ ומתערה כאזרח רענן׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version

word.kjv: But God will redeem my soul from the power of the grave: for he shall receive me. Selah.
word.thailand: แต่พระเจ้าจะทรงไถ่จิตวิญญาณของข้าพเจ้าจากฤทธานุภาพของแดนผู้ตาย เพราะพระองค์จะทรงรับข้าพเจ้าไว้ เซลาห์
word.spanish1909: Empero Dios redimirá mi vida del poder de la sepultura, Cuando me tomará. (Selah.)
word.latinvulgate: Et invoca me in die tribulationis ; eruam te, et honorificabis me.
word.italian1927: Ma Iddio riscatterà l’anima mia dal potere del soggiorno dei morti, perché mi prenderà con sé. Sela.
word.german1912: Aber Gott wird meine Seele erlösen aus der Hölle Gewalt; denn er hat mich angenommen. (Sela.)
word.french1910: Mais Dieu sauvera mon âme du séjour des morts, Car il me prendra sous sa protection. -Pause.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 但　神必救贖我的靈魂脫離陰間的權勢，因為他必把我接去。（細拉）
word.korean: 하나님은 나를 영접하시리니 이러므로 내 영혼을 음부의 권세에서 구속하시리로다 (셀라)
word.tagalog: Nguni't tutubusin ng Dios ang aking kaluluwa sa kapangyarihan ng Sheol: sapagka't tatanggapin niya ako. (Selah)
word.maori: ¶ Ma te Atua ia toku wairua e hoko mai i te reinga: ko ia hoki hei tukunga atu moku. (Hera.
word.cebuano: Apan pagalukaton sa Dios ang akong kalag gikan sa gahum sa Sheol; Kay pagadawaton niya ako. (Selah)
word.hebrew: טו  כצאן לשאול שתו--    מות ירעם וירדו בם ישרים לבקר--וצירם (וצורם) לבלות שאול    מזבל לו
word.hebrewmodern: אך אלהים יפדה נפשי מיד שאול כי יקחני סלה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ἐπικάλεσαί με ἐν ἡμέρᾳ θλίψεως καὶ ἐξελοῦμαί σε καὶ δοξάσεις με διάψαλμα

word.kjv: Slay them not, lest my people forget: scatter them by thy power; and bring them down, O Lord our shield.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่องค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้า พระโล่ของข้าพระองค์ทั้งหลาย ขออย่าทรงสังหารเขาเสีย เกรงว่าชนชาติของข้าพระองค์จะลืม ขอให้เขาระหกระเหินไปด้วยฤทธานุภาพของพระองค์และทำให้เขาล้มลง
word.spanish1909: No los matarás, porque mi pueblo no se olvide: Hazlos vagar con tu fortaleza, y abátelos. Oh Jehová, escudo nuestro,
word.latinvulgate: Quis deducet me in civitatem munitam ? quis deducet me usque in Idumæam ?
word.italian1927: Non li uccidere, che talora il mio popolo non lo dimentichi: falli, per la tua potenza, andar vagando ed abbattili, o Signore, nostro scudo.
word.german1912: Erwürge sie nicht, daß es mein Volk nicht vergesse; zerstreue sie aber mit deiner Macht, HERR, unser Schild, und stoße sie hinunter!
word.french1910: Ne les tue pas, de peur que mon peuple ne l'oublie; Fais-les errer par ta puissance, et précipite-les, Seigneur, notre bouclier!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 不要殺害他們，免得我的人民忘記了；主啊！你是我們的盾牌，求你用你的能力，使他們飄流無定，並且降為卑微。
word.korean: 저희를 죽이지 마옵소서 나의 백성이 잊을까 하나이다 우리 방패되신 주여, 주의 능력으로 저희를 흩으시고 낮추소서
word.tagalog: Huwag mo silang patayin, baka makalimot ang aking bayan; pangalatin mo sila ng iyong kapangyarihan, at ibaba mo sila, Oh Panginoon na kalasag namin.
word.maori: Kaua ratou e whakamatea, kei wareware toku iwi: kia whakamararatia ratou e tou kaha; whakataka iho ratou, e te Ariki, e to matou whakangungu rakau.
word.cebuano: Dili mo sila pagpatyon, tingali unya malimot ang akong katawohan: Papatlaaga sila pinaagi sa imong gahum, ug ipaubos mo sila, Oh Ginoo nga among taming.
word.hebrew: יא  אלהי חסדו (חסדי) יקדמני    אלהים יראני בשררי
word.hebrewmodern: אל תהרגם פן ישכחו עמי הניעמו בחילך והורידמו מגננו אדני׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: τίς ἀπάξει με εἰς πόλιν περιοχῆς τίς ὁδηγήσει με ἕως τῆς ιδουμαίας

word.kjv: But I will sing of thy power; yea, I will sing aloud of thy mercy in the morning: for thou hast been my defence and refuge in the day of my trouble.
word.thailand: แต่ข้าพระองค์จะร้องเพลงถึงอานุภาพของพระองค์ ข้าพระองค์จะร้องเพลงถึงความเมตตาของพระองค์ในเวลาเช้า เพราะพระองค์ทรงเป็นป้อมปราการของข้าพระองค์ เป็นที่ลี้ภัยในยามทุกข์ของข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Yo empero cantaré tu fortaleza, Y loaré de mañana tu misericordia: Porque has sido mi amparo Y refugio en el día de mi angustia.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Ma io canterò la tua potenza, e al mattino loderò ad alta voce la tua benignità, perché tu sei stato per me un alto ricetto, un rifugio nel giorno della mia distretta.
word.german1912: Ich aber will von deiner Macht singen und des Morgens rühmen deine Güte; denn du bist mir Schutz und Zuflucht in meiner Not.
word.french1910: Et moi, je chanterai ta force; Dès le matin, je célébrerai ta bonté. Car tu es pour moi une haute retraite, Un refuge au jour de ma détresse.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 至於我，我要歌頌你的能力，每天早晨我要向你的慈愛歡呼，因為你作了我的高臺，在患難的日子，作了我的避難所。
word.korean: 나는 주의 힘을 노래하며 아침에 주의 인자하심을 높이 부르오리니 주는 나의 산성이시며 나의 환난 날에 피난처심이니이다
word.tagalog: Nguni't aking aawitin ang iyong kalakasan; Oo, aking aawiting malakas ang iyong kagandahang-loob sa kinaumagahan: sapagka't ikaw ay naging aking matayog na moog, at kanlungan sa kaarawan ng aking kabagabagan.
word.maori: Ko ahau ia, ka waiatatia e ahau tou kaha; ae, i te ata ka hamamatia e ahau tau mahi toku: ko koe hoki toku pa, toku piringa i te ra o toku pouri.
word.cebuano: Apan magaawit ako mahatungod sa imong kusog; Oo, magaawit ako sa makusog gayud mahatungod sa imong mahigugmaong-kalolot sa kabuntagon: Kay ikaw mao ang akong hataas nga torre, Ug usa ka dalangpanan sa adlaw sa akong kaguol.
word.hebrew: טז  המה ינועון (יניעון) לאכל--    אם-לא ישבעו וילינו
word.hebrewmodern: ואני אשיר עזך וארנן לבקר חסדך כי היית משגב לי ומנוס ביום צר לי׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version

word.kjv: God hath spoken once; twice have I heard this; that power belongeth unto God.
word.thailand: พระเจ้าตรัสครั้งหนึ่ง ข้าพเจ้าได้ยินอย่างนี้สองครั้งแล้ว ว่าฤทธานุภาพเป็นของพระเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Una vez habló Dios; Dos veces he oído esto: Que de Dios es la fortaleza.
word.latinvulgate: tradentur in manus gladii ; partes vulpium erunt.
word.italian1927: Dio ha parlato una volta, due volte ho udito questo: che la potenza appartiene a Dio;
word.german1912: Gott hat ein Wort geredet, das habe ich etlichemal gehört: daß Gott allein mächtig ist.
word.french1910: Dieu a parlé une fois; Deux fois j'ai entendu ceci: C'est que la force est à Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神說了一次，我兩次聽過這事：能力都屬於　神。
word.korean: 하나님이 한 두번 하신 말씀을 내가 들었나니 권능은 하나님께 속하였다 하셨도다
word.tagalog: Ang Dios ay nagsalitang minsan, makalawang aking narinig ito; na ang kapangyarihan ay ukol sa Dios:
word.maori: Kotahi korerotanga a te Atua, ka rua oku rongonga i tenei, no te Atua te kaha.
word.cebuano: Ang Dios nagsulti sa nakausa, Nakaduha ako makadungog niini, Nga ang gahum iya man sa Dios.
word.hebrew: יא  אל-תבטחו בעשק    ובגזל אל-תהבלו חיל כי-ינוב--    אל-תשיתו לב
word.hebrewmodern: אחת דבר אלהים שתים זו שמעתי כי עז לאלהים׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: παραδοθήσονται εἰς χεῖρας ῥομφαίας μερίδες ἀλωπέκων ἔσονται

word.kjv: To see thy power and thy glory, so as I have seen thee in the sanctuary.
word.thailand: เช่นนั้นแหละ ข้าพระองค์จึงเคยเห็นพระองค์ในสถานบริสุทธิ์ เห็นฤทธานุภาพและสง่าราศีของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Para ver tu fortaleza y tu gloria, Así como te he mirado en el santuario.
word.latinvulgate: Exaudi, Deus, orationem meam cum deprecor ; a timore inimici eripe animam meam.
word.italian1927: Così t’ho io mirato nel santuario per veder la tua forza e la tua gloria.
word.german1912: Daselbst sehe ich nach dir in deinem Heiligtum, wollte gerne schauen deine Macht und Ehre.
word.french1910: Ainsi je te contemple dans le sanctuaire, Pour voir ta puissance et ta gloire.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因此，我在聖所中瞻仰你，為要見你的能力和榮耀。
word.korean: 내가 주의 권능과 영광을 보려 하여 이와 같이 성소에서 주를 바라보았나이다
word.tagalog: Sa gayo'y tumingin ako sa iyo sa santuario. Upang tanawin ang iyong kapangyarihan at ang iyong kaluwalhatian.
word.maori: Koia i titiro atu ai ahau ki a koe i te wahi tapu, kia kite ai i tou kaha, i tou kororia.
word.cebuano: Mao nga gipangita ko ikaw sa balaang puloy-anan, Aron sa pagtan-aw sa imong gahum ug sa imong himaya.
word.hebrew: ב  אלהים אלי אתה--    אשחרך צמאה לך נפשי--    כמה לך בשרי בארץ-ציה ועיף    בלי-מים
word.hebrewmodern: כן בקדש חזיתיך לראות עזך וכבודך׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: εἰσάκουσον ὁ θεός τῆς φωνῆς μου ἐν τῷ δέεσθαί με ἀπὸ φόβου ἐχθροῦ ἐξελοῦ τὴν ψυχήν μου

word.kjv: Which by his strength setteth fast the mountains; being girded with power:
word.thailand: พระองค์ผู้ทรงสถาปนาภูเขาด้วยพระกำลังของพระองค์ ทรงคาดพระองค์ไว้ด้วยอานุภาพ
word.spanish1909: Tú, el que afirma los montes con su potencia, Ceñido de valentía:
word.latinvulgate: Qui convertit mare in aridam, in flumine pertransibunt pede ; ibi lætabimur in ipso.
word.italian1927: Egli con la sua potenza rende stabili i monti; egli è cinto di forza.
word.german1912: der die Berge fest setzt in seiner Kraft und gerüstet ist mit Macht;
word.french1910: Il affermit les montagnes par sa force, Il est ceint de puissance;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你以大能束腰，用自己的力量堅立眾山。
word.korean: 주는 주의 힘으로 산을 세우시며 권능으로 띠를 띠시며
word.tagalog: Na naglalagay na matibay ng mga bundok sa pamamagitan ng kaniyang kalakasan; palibhasa't nabibigkisan sa palibot ng kapangyarihan:
word.maori: ¶ E whakau nei i nga maunga, he kaha hoki nona; tona whitiki nei he kaha.
word.cebuano: Nga pinaagi sa iyang gahum nagapalig-on sa mga bukid, Sanglit gibaksan sa kusog;
word.hebrew: ו  נוראות בצדק תעננו--    אלהי ישענו מבטח כל-קצוי-ארץ    וים רחקים
word.hebrewmodern: מכין הרים בכחו נאזר בגבורה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ὁ μεταστρέφων τὴν θάλασσαν εἰς ξηράν ἐν ποταμῷ διελεύσονται ποδί ἐκεῖ εὐφρανθησόμεθα ἐπ' αὐτῷ

word.kjv: Say unto God, How terrible art thou in thy works! through the greatness of thy power shall thine enemies submit themselves unto thee.
word.thailand: จงทูลพระเจ้าว่า "พระราชกิจของพระองค์น่าครั่นคร้ามยิ่งนัก ฤทธานุภาพของพระองค์ใหญ่หลวงนัก จนศัตรูจะหมอบราบต่อเบื้องพระพักตร์พระองค์
word.spanish1909: Decid á Dios: ­Cuán terribles tus obras! Por lo grande de tu fortaleza te mentirán tus enemigos.
word.latinvulgate: ut cognascamus in terra viam tuam, in omnibus gentibus salutare tuum.
word.italian1927: Dite a Dio: Come son tremende le opere tue! Per la grandezza della tua forza i tuoi nemici ti aduleranno.
word.german1912: Sprechet zu Gott: "Wie wunderbar sind deine Werke! es wird deinen Feinden fehlen vor deiner großen Macht.
word.french1910: Dites à Dieu: Que tes oeuvres sont redoutables! A cause de la grandeur de ta force, tes ennemis te flattent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 要對　神說：“你的作為多麼可畏！因你偉大的能力，你的仇敵必向你假意歸順。
word.korean: 하나님께 고하기를 주의 일이 어찌 그리 엄위하신지요 주의 큰 권능으로 인하여 주의 원수가 주께 복종할 것이며
word.tagalog: Inyong sabihin sa Dios, napaka kakilakilabot ng iyong mga gawa! Sa kadakilaan ng iyong kapangyarihan ay magsisuko ang iyong mga kaaway sa iyo.
word.maori: Mea atu ki te Atua, Ano te wehi o au mahi! Ma te nui o tou kaha e ngohengohe ai ou hoariri ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Ingna ninyo ang Dios: Pagkamakalilisang ang imong mga buhat! Pinaagi sa kadaku sa imong gahum ang imong mga kaaway managyukbo sa ilang kaugalingon nganha kanimo,
word.hebrew: ג  אמרו לאלהים מה-נורא מעשיך    ברב עזך יכחשו לך איביך
word.hebrewmodern: אמרו לאלהים מה נורא מעשיך ברב עזך יכחשו לך איביך׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: τοῦ γνῶναι ἐν τῇ γῇ τὴν ὁδόν σου ἐν πᾶσιν ἔθνεσιν τὸ σωτήριόν σου

word.kjv: He ruleth by his power for ever; his eyes behold the nations: let not the rebellious exalt themselves. Selah.
word.thailand: ผู้ทรงปกครองด้วยอานุภาพของพระองค์เป็นนิตย์ ผู้ซึ่งพระเนตรเฝ้าบรรดาประชาชาติอยู่ อย่าให้คนมักกบฏยกย่องตนเอง เซลาห์
word.spanish1909: El se enseñorea con su fortaleza para siempre: Sus ojos atalayan sobre las gentes: Los rebeldes no serán ensalzados. (Selah.)
word.latinvulgate: Terra dedit fructum suum : benedicat nos Deus, Deus noster !
word.italian1927: Egli, con la sua potenza, signoreggia in eterno; i suoi occhi osservan le nazioni; i ribelli non facciano i superbi! Sela.
word.german1912: Er herrscht mit seiner Gewalt ewiglich; seine Augen schauen auf die Völker. Die Abtrünnigen werden sich nicht erhöhen können. (Sela.)
word.french1910: Il domine éternellement par sa puissance, Ses yeux observent les nations: Que les rebelles ne s'élèvent pas! -Pause.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他以自己的權能永遠統管萬有，他的眼睛鑒察萬國，悖逆的人不可自高。（細拉）
word.korean: 저가 그 능으로 영원히 치리하시며 눈으로 열방을 감찰하시나니 거역하는 자는 자고하지 말지어다 (셀라)
word.tagalog: Siya'y nagpupuno ng kaniyang kapangyarihan magpakailan man: papansinin ng kaniyang mga mata ang mga bansa: huwag mangagpakabunyi ang mga manghihimagsik. (Selah)
word.maori: Ko tona kawanatanga tuturu tonu i runga i tona kaha; e titiro ana ona kanohi ki nga tauiwi; kei whakakake te hunga tutu. (Hera.
word.cebuano: Siya nagahari pinaagi sa iyang gahum sa walay katapusan; Ang iyang mga mata naniid sa mga nasud: Dili unta magmapahitas-on ang mga masukihon sa ilang kaugalingon. (Selah)
word.hebrew: ז  משל בגבורתו עולם--    עיניו בגוים תצפינה הסוררים    אל-ירימו (ירומו) למו סלה
word.hebrewmodern: משל בגבורתו עולם עיניו בגוים תצפינה הסוררים אל ירימו למו סלה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: γῆ ἔδωκεν τὸν καρπὸν αὐτῆς εὐλογήσαι ἡμᾶς ὁ θεὸς ὁ θεὸς ἡμῶν

word.kjv: O God, thou art terrible out of thy holy places: the God of Israel is he that giveth strength and power unto his people. Blessed be God.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเจ้า พระองค์ทรงน่าครั่นคร้ามนักในสถานบริสุทธิ์ของพระองค์ คือพระเจ้าของอิสราเอล พระองค์นั้นประทานฤทธิ์และกำลังแก่ประชาชนของพระองค์ สาธุการแด่พระเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Terrible eres, oh Dios, desde tus santuarios: El Dios de Israel, él da fortaleza y vigor á su pueblo. Bendito Dios.
word.latinvulgate: Laudent illum cæli et terra ; mare, et omnia reptilia in eis.
word.italian1927: O Dio, tu sei tremendo dai tuoi santuari! L’Iddio d’Israele è quel che dà forza e potenza al suo popolo. Benedetto sia Iddio!
word.german1912: Gott ist wundersam in seinem Heiligtum. Er ist Gott Israels; er wird dem Volk Macht und Kraft geben. Gelobt sei Gott!
word.french1910: De ton sanctuaire, ô Dieu! tu es redoutable. Le Dieu d'Israël donne à son peuple la force et la puissance. Béni soit Dieu!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神啊！你在你的聖所中顯為可畏；以色列的　神把能力和權能賜給他的子民。　神是應當稱頌的。
word.korean: 하나님이여, 위엄을 성소에서 나타내시나이다 이스라엘의 하나님은 그 백성에게 힘과 능을 주시나니 하나님을 찬송할지어다 !
word.tagalog: Oh Dios, ikaw ay kakilakilabot mula sa iyong mga dakong banal: ang Dios ng Israel, ay nagbibigay ng kalakasan at kapangyarihan sa kaniyang bayan. Purihin ang Panginoon.
word.maori: Ka wehingia koe, e te Atua, i roto i ou wahi tapu: ko te Atua o Iharaira te kaihomai i te kaha, i te mana, ki tona iwi. Whakapaingia te Atua.
word.cebuano: Oh Dios, ikaw makalilisang gikan sa imong mga balaang dapit: Ang Dios sa Israel, siya nagahatag ug kusog ug gahum ngadto sa iyang katawohan. Dalayegon ang Dios.
word.hebrew: לה  תנו עז לאלהים    על-ישראל גאותו ועזו בשחקים [ (Psalms 68:36) לו  נורא אלהים    ממקדשיך אל ישראל--    הוא נתן עז ותעצמות לעם ברוך אלהים ]
word.hebrewmodern: נורא אלהים ממקדשיך אל ישראל הוא נתן עז ותעצמות לעם ברוך אלהים׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: αἰνεσάτωσαν αὐτὸν οἱ οὐρανοὶ καὶ ἡ γῆ θάλασσα καὶ πάντα τὰ ἕρποντα ἐν αὐτοῖς

word.kjv: Now also when I am old and grayheaded, O God, forsake me not; until I have shewed thy strength unto this generation, and thy power to every one that is to come.
word.thailand: แม้จะถึงวัยชราและผมหงอกก็ตาม ข้าแต่พระเจ้า ขออย่าทรงทอดทิ้งข้าพระองค์เสีย จนกว่าข้าพระองค์จะประกาศถึงอานุภาพของพระองค์แก่ชั่วอายุถัดไป และฤทธิ์เดชของพระองค์แก่บรรดาผู้ที่จะเกิดมา
word.spanish1909: Y aun hasta la vejez y las canas; oh Dios, no me desampares, Hasta que denuncie tu brazo á la posteridad, Tus valentías á todos los que han de venir.
word.latinvulgate: Benedictus Dominus, Deus Israël, qui facit mirabilia solus.
word.italian1927: Ed anche quando sia giunto alla vecchiaia ed alla canizie, o Dio, non abbandonarmi, finché non abbia fatto conoscere il tuo braccio a questa generazione, e la tua potenza a quelli che verranno.
word.german1912: Auch verlaß mich nicht, Gott, im Alter, wenn ich grau werde, bis ich deinen Arm verkündige Kindeskindern und deine Kraft allen, die noch kommen sollen.
word.french1910: Ne m'abandonne pas, ô Dieu! même dans la blanche vieillesse, Afin que j'annonce ta force à la génération présente, Ta puissance à la génération future!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神啊！到我年老髮白的時候，求你仍不要離棄我，等我把你的能力向下一代傳揚，把你的大能向後世所有的人傳揚。
word.korean: 하나님이여, 내가 늙어 백수가 될 때에도 나를 버리지 마시며 내가 주의 힘을 후대에 전하고 주의 능을 장래 모든 사람에게 전하기까지 나를 버리지 마소서
word.tagalog: Oo, pag ako'y tumanda at may uban, Oh Dios, huwag mo akong pabayaan; hanggang sa aking maipahayag ang iyong kalakasan sa sumusunod na lahi, ang iyong kapangyarihan sa bawa't isa na darating.
word.maori: Na kaua ahau e whakarerea, e te Atua, a koroheke noa, hina noa ahau, kia whakakitea ra ano e ahau tou kaha ki tenei whakatupuranga, tou nui ki nga tangata katoa e puta mai a mua.
word.cebuano: Oo, bisan sa diha nga matigulang na ako ug maubanon, Oh Dios, ayaw ako pagbiyai, Hangtud nga ikamantala ko ang imong kusog ngadto sa sunod nga kaliwatan, Ang imong gahum ngadto sa tagsa-tagsa nga moanhi.
word.hebrew: יח  וגם עד-זקנה ושיבה--    אלהים אל-תעזבני עד-אגיד זרועך לדור    לכל-יבוא גבורתך
word.hebrewmodern: וגם עד זקנה ושיבה אלהים אל תעזבני עד אגיד זרועך לדור לכל יבוא גבורתך׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: εὐλογητὸς κύριος ὁ θεὸς ὁ θεὸς ισραηλ ὁ ποιῶν θαυμάσια μόνος

word.kjv: He caused an east wind to blow in the heaven: and by his power he brought in the south wind.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงกระทำให้ลมตะวันออกพัดในฟ้าสวรรค์ และทรงนำลมใต้ออกมาด้วยฤทธิ์ของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Movió el solano en el cielo, Y trajo con su fortaleza el austro.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Fece levare in cielo il vento orientale, e con la sua potenza addusse il vento di mezzodì;
word.german1912: Er ließ wehen den Ostwind unter dem Himmel und erregte durch seine Stärke den Südwind
word.french1910: Il fit souffler dans les cieux le vent d'orient, Et il amena par sa puissance le vent du midi;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他從天空颳起東風，施能力領出南風。
word.korean: 저가 동풍으로 하늘에서 일게 하시며 그 권능으로 남풍을 인도하시고
word.tagalog: Kaniyang pinahihip ang hanging silanganan sa mga langit: at sa pamamagitan ng kaniyang kapangyarihan ay pinatnubayan niya ang hanging timugan.
word.maori: I whakaohokia e ia te marangai i te rangi: i takina ano te tonga e tona kaha.
word.cebuano: Iyang gipahuros ang hangin sa timogan diha sa kalangitan; Ug pinaagi sa iyang gahum iyang gimandoan ang hangin sa habagatan.
word.hebrew: כו  יסע קדים בשמים    וינהג בעזו תימן
word.hebrewmodern: יסע קדים בשמים וינהג בעזו תימן׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Let the sighing of the prisoner come before thee; according to the greatness of thy power preserve thou those that are appointed to die;
word.thailand: ขอให้เสียงคร่ำครวญของบรรดาเชลยมาอยู่ต่อพระพักตร์พระองค์ ด้วยฤทธานุภาพอันยิ่งใหญ่ของพระองค์ ขอทรงสงวนคนเหล่านั้นที่ต้องถึงตาย
word.spanish1909: Entre ante tu acatamiento el gemido de los presos: Conforme á la grandeza de tu brazo preserva á los sentenciados á muerte.
word.latinvulgate: Operuit montes umbra ejus, et arbusta ejus cedros Dei.
word.italian1927: Giunga dinanzi a te il gemito de’ prigionieri; secondo la potenza del tuo braccio, scampa quelli che son condannati a morte.
word.german1912: Laß vor dich kommen das Seufzen der Gefangenen; nach deinem großen Arm erhalte die Kinder des Todes
word.french1910: Que les gémissements des captifs parviennent jusqu'à toi! Par ton bras puissant sauve ceux qui vont périr!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願被囚的人的唉哼，達到你面前；願你用你的大能，使那些已定死罪的人可以存留。
word.korean: 갇힌 자의 탄식으로 주의 앞에 이르게 하시며 죽이기로 정한 자를 주의 크신 능력을 따라 보존하소서
word.tagalog: Dumating nawa sa harap mo ang buntong-hininga ng bihag; ayon sa kadakilaan ng iyong kapangyarihan ay palagiin mo yaong nangatakda sa kamatayan:
word.maori: Kia tae atu ki tou aroaro te aue a te herehere: kia rite ki te nui o tou kaha tau whakaora i te hunga e meatia ana kia mate.
word.cebuano: Modangat unta sa atubangan nimo ang pagpanghupaw sa mga binilanggo: Sumala sa pagkadaku sa imong kagahum bantayi kadtong mga natudlo sa kamatayon;
word.hebrew: יא  תבוא לפניך אנקת אסיר    כגדל זרועך--הותר בני תמותה
word.hebrewmodern: תבוא לפניך אנקת אסיר כגדל זרועך הותר בני תמותה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἐκάλυψεν ὄρη ἡ σκιὰ αὐτῆς καὶ αἱ ἀναδενδράδες αὐτῆς τὰς κέδρους τοῦ θεοῦ

word.kjv: Who knoweth the power of thine anger? even according to thy fear, so is thy wrath.
word.thailand: ผู้ใดจะทราบถึงฤทธิ์ความกริ้วของพระองค์ และพระพิโรธของพระองค์ตามความเกรงกลัวพระองค์
word.spanish1909: ¿Quién conoce la fortaleza de tu ira, Y tu indignación según que debes ser temido?
word.latinvulgate: Quoniam angelis suis mandavit de te, ut custodiant te in omnibus viis tuis.
word.italian1927: Chi conosce la forza della tua ira e il tuo cruccio secondo il timore che t’è dovuto?
word.german1912: Wer glaubt aber, daß du so sehr zürnest, und wer fürchtet sich vor solchem deinem Grimm?
word.french1910: Qui prend garde à la force de ta colère, Et à ton courroux, selon la crainte qui t'est due?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 誰曉得你怒氣的威力，誰按著你該受的敬畏曉得你的忿怒呢？
word.korean: 누가 주의 노의 능력을 알며 누가 주를 두려워하여야 할대로 주의 진노를 알리이까
word.tagalog: Sinong nakakaalam ng kapangyarihan ng iyong galit, at ng iyong poot ayon sa katakutan na marapat sa iyo?
word.maori: Ko wai te matau ana ki te kaha o tou riri? Rite pu ki te wehi ki a koe tou riri.
word.cebuano: Kinsa ba ang makaila sa gahum sa imong kasuko, Ug sa imong kaligutgut sumala sa kahadlok nga angay kanimo?
word.hebrew: יא  מי-יודע עז אפך    וכיראתך עברתך
word.hebrewmodern: מי יודע עז אפך וכיראתך עברתך׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ὅτι τοῖς ἀγγέλοις αὐτοῦ ἐντελεῖται περὶ σοῦ τοῦ διαφυλάξαι σε ἐν πάσαις ταῖς ὁδοῖς σου

word.kjv: Nevertheless he saved them for his name's sake, that he might make his mighty power to be known.
word.thailand: ถึงกระนั้นพระองค์ยังทรงช่วยท่านให้รอดเพราะเห็นแก่พระนามของพระองค์ เพื่อพระองค์จะให้ทราบถึงฤทธานุภาพอันใหญ่ยิ่งของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Salvólos empero por amor de su nombre, Para hacer notoria su fortaleza.
word.latinvulgate: Confiteantur Domino misericordiæ ejus, et mirabilia ejus filiis hominum.
word.italian1927: Nondimeno egli li salvò per amor del suo nome, per far conoscere la sua potenza.
word.german1912: Er half ihnen aber um seines Namens willen, daß er seine Macht bewiese.
word.french1910: Mais il les sauva à cause de son nom, Pour manifester sa puissance.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 但他因自己的名的緣故拯救他們，為要彰顯他的大能。
word.korean: 그러나 여호와께서 자기 이름을 위하여 저희를 구원하셨으니 그 큰 권능을 알게 하려 하심이로다
word.tagalog: Gayon ma'y iniligtas niya sila dahil sa kaniyang pangalan, upang kaniyang maipabatid ang kaniyang matibay na kapangyarihan.
word.maori: Otira whakaorangia ana ratou e ia, he whakaaro ki tona ingoa, kia matauria ai tona kaha.
word.cebuano: Bisan pa niana iyang giluwas sila tungod sa iyang ngalan, Aron nga iyang ikapadayag ang iyang makusganong gahum.
word.hebrew: ח  ויושיעם למען שמו--    להודיע את-גבורתו
word.hebrewmodern: ויושיעם למען שמו להודיע את גבורתו׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἐξομολογησάσθωσαν τῷ κυρίῳ τὰ ἐλέη αὐτοῦ καὶ τὰ θαυμάσια αὐτοῦ τοῖς υἱοῖς τῶν ἀνθρώπων

word.kjv: Thy people shall be willing in the day of thy power, in the beauties of holiness from the womb of the morning: thou hast the dew of thy youth.
word.thailand: ชนชาติของพระองค์ท่านจะสมัครถวายตัวของเขาด้วยความเต็มใจ ในวันแห่งฤทธิ์อำนาจของพระองค์ท่าน ด้วยเครื่องประดับแห่งความบริสุทธิ์ จากครรภ์ของอรุโณทัย น้ำค้างแห่งวัยหนุ่มเป็นของพระองค์ท่าน
word.spanish1909: Tu pueblo serálo de buena voluntad en el día de tu poder, En la hermosura de la santidad: desde el seno de la aurora, Tienes tú el rocío de tu juventud.
word.latinvulgate: Confessio et magnificentia opus ejus ; et justitia ejus manet in sæculum sæculi.
word.italian1927: Il tuo popolo s’offre volenteroso nel giorno che raduni il tuo esercito. Parata di santità, dal seno dell’alba, la tua gioventù viene a te come la rugiada.
word.german1912: Nach deinem Sieg wird dir dein Volk willig opfern in heiligem Schmuck. Deine Kinder werden dir geboren wie der Tau aus der Morgenröte.
word.french1910: Ton peuple est plein d'ardeur, quand tu rassembles ton armée; Avec des ornements sacrés, du sein de l'aurore Ta jeunesse vient à toi comme une rosée.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 在你征戰的日子，你的人民都樂意投身；你的少年人以聖潔為裝飾，好像清晨的甘露，到你那裡。
word.korean: 주의 권능의 날에 주의 백성이 거룩한 옷을 입고 즐거이 헌신하니 새벽 이슬 같은 주의 청년들이 주께 나오는도다
word.tagalog: Ang bayan mo'y naghahandog na kusa sa kaarawan ng iyong kapangyarihan, sa kagandahan ng kabanalan: mula sa bukang liwayway ng umaga, ikaw ay may hamog ng iyong kabinataan.
word.maori: Ka kakama tou iwi ki te tapae atu i a ratou i te ra o tou kaha: i te ataahua o nga mea tapu, no te kopu mai o te ata, kei a koe te tomairangi o tou whanaketanga.
word.cebuano: Ang imong katawohan managhalad sa ilang kaugalingon sa kinabubut-on Sa adlaw sa imong gahum, sa matahum nga pagkabalaan: Gikan sa tagoangkan sa kabuntagon Ikaw adunay tun-og sa imong pagkabatan-on.
word.hebrew: ג  עמך נדבת    ביום חילך בהדרי-קדש מרחם משחר    לך טל ילדתיך
word.hebrewmodern: עמך נדבת ביום חילך בהדרי קדש מרחם משחר לך טל ילדתיך׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἐξομολόγησις καὶ μεγαλοπρέπεια τὸ ἔργον αὐτοῦ καὶ ἡ δικαιοσύνη αὐτοῦ μένει εἰς τὸν αἰῶνα τοῦ αἰῶνος

word.kjv: He hath shewed his people the power of his works, that he may give them the heritage of the heathen.
word.thailand: พระองค์ได้ทรงสำแดงฤทธานุภาพแห่งพระราชกิจของพระองค์แก่ประชาชนของพระองค์ เพื่อจะทรงประทานมรดกของบรรดาประชาชาติแก่เขา
word.spanish1909: El poder de sus obras anunció á su pueblo, Dándole la heredad de las gentes.
word.latinvulgate: quia in æternum non commovebitur.
word.italian1927: Egli ha fatto conoscere al suo popolo la potenza delle sue opere, dandogli l’eredità delle nazioni.
word.german1912: Er läßt verkündigen seine gewaltigen Taten seinem Volk, daß er ihnen gebe das Erbe der Heiden.
word.french1910: Il a manifesté à son peuple la puissance de ses oeuvres, En lui livrant l'héritage des nations.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他向自己的子民彰顯大能的作為，把列國賜給他們為業。
word.korean: 저가 자기 백성에게 열방을 기업으로 주사 그 행사의 능을 저희에게 보이셨도다
word.tagalog: Kaniyang ipinakilala sa kaniyang bayan ang kapangyarihan ng kaniyang mga gawa, sa pagbibigay niya sa kanila ng mana ng mga bansa.
word.maori: ¶ Kua whakakitea e ia ki tana iwi te kaha o ana mahi, i tana hoatutanga i to nga tauiwi hei kainga tupu mo ratou.
word.cebuano: Ang gahum sa iyang mga buhat gipakita niya sa iyang katawohan, Sa paghatag kanila sa panulondon sa mga nasud.
word.hebrew: ו  כח מעשיו הגיד לעמו--    לתת להם נחלת גוים
word.hebrewmodern: כח מעשיו הגיד לעמו לתת להם נחלת גוים׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ὅτι εἰς τὸν αἰῶνα οὐ σαλευθήσεται εἰς μνημόσυνον αἰώνιον ἔσται δίκαιος

word.kjv: They shall speak of the glory of thy kingdom, and talk of thy power;
word.thailand: เขาทั้งหลายจะพูดถึงสง่าราศีแห่งราชอาณาจักรของพระองค์ และเล่าถึงฤทธานุภาพของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: La gloria de tu reino digan, Y hablen de tu fortaleza;
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Diranno la gloria del tuo regno, e narreranno la tua potenza
word.german1912: und die Ehre deines Königreiches rühmen und von deiner Gewalt reden,
word.french1910: Ils diront la gloire de ton règne, Et ils proclameront ta puissance,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們要講論你國的榮耀，也要述說你大能的作為。
word.korean: 저희가 주의 나라의 영광을 말하며 주의 능을 일러서
word.tagalog: Sila'y mangagsasalita ng kaluwalhatian ng iyong kaharian, at mangungusap ng iyong kapangyarihan;
word.maori: Ma ratou e korero te kororia o tou kingitanga, e kauwhau hoki tou kaha;
word.cebuano: Sila managsulti mahitungod sa himaya sa imong gingharian, Ug managhisgut mahitungod sa imong gahum;
word.hebrew: יא  כבוד מלכותך יאמרו    וגבורתך ידברו
word.hebrewmodern: כבוד מלכותך יאמרו וגבורתך ידברו׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Great is our Lord, and of great power: his understanding is infinite.
word.thailand: องค์พระผู้เป็นเจ้าของเราใหญ่ยิ่งและทรงฤทธานุภาพอุดม ความเข้าใจของพระองค์นั้นวัดไม่ได้
word.spanish1909: Grande es el Señor nuestro, y de mucha potencia; Y de su entendimiento no hay número.
word.latinvulgate: Qui dat nivem sicut lanam, nebulam sicut cinerem spargit.
word.italian1927: Grande è il Signor nostro, e immenso è il suo potere; la sua intelligenza è infinita.
word.german1912: Der HERR ist groß und von großer Kraft; und ist unbegreiflich, wie er regiert.
word.french1910: Notre Seigneur est grand, puissant par sa force, Son intelligence n'a point de limite.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我們的主偉大，大有能力；他的智慧無法測度。
word.korean: 우리 주는 광대하시며 능력이 많으시며 그 지혜가 무궁하시도다
word.tagalog: Dakila ang ating Panginoon, at makapangyarihan sa kapangyarihan; ang kaniyang unawa ay walang hanggan,
word.maori: He nui to tatou Ariki, he nui hoki tona kaha: e kore e taea tona matauranga te whakaaro.
word.cebuano: Daku ang atong Ginoo, ug sa gahum nga dili hitupngan; Ug ang iyang salabutan walay kinutoban.
word.hebrew: ה  גדול אדונינו ורב-כח    לתבונתו אין מספר
word.hebrewmodern: גדול אדונינו ורב כח לתבונתו אין מספר׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: τοῦ διδόντος χιόνα ὡσεὶ ἔριον ὁμίχλην ὡσεὶ σποδὸν πάσσοντος

word.kjv: Praise ye the LORD. Praise God in his sanctuary: praise him in the firmament of his power.
word.thailand: จงสรรเสริญพระเยโฮวาห์เถิด จงสรรเสริญพระเจ้าในสถานบริสุทธิ์ของพระองค์ จงสรรเสริญพระองค์ในพื้นฟ้าอันอานุภาพของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Aleluya. ALABAD á Dios en su santuario: Alabadle en la extensión de su fortaleza.
word.latinvulgate: Alleluja. Laudate Dominum in sanctis ejus ; laudate eum in firmamento virtutis ejus.
word.italian1927: Alleluia. Lodate Iddio nel suo santuario, lodatelo nella distesa ove risplende la sua potenza.
word.german1912: Halleluja! Lobet den HERRN in seinem Heiligtum; lobet ihn in der Feste seiner Macht!
word.french1910: Louez l'Eternel! Louez Dieu dans son sanctuaire! Louez-le dans l'étendue, où éclate sa puissance!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 凡有氣息的應當讚美　神你們要讚美耶和華。要在　神的聖所讚美他，要在他顯能力的穹蒼下讚美他。
word.korean: 할렐루야 ! 그 성소에서 하나님을 찬양하며 그 권능의 궁창에서 그를 찬양할지어다 !
word.tagalog: Purihin ninyo ang Panginoon. Purihin ninyo ang Dios sa kaniyang santuario: purihin ninyo siya sa langit ng kaniyang kapangyarihan.
word.maori: ¶ Whakamoemititia a Ihowa. Whakamoemititia te Atua i tona wahi tapu: whakamoemititia ia i te kikorangi o tona kaha.
word.cebuano: Dayegon ninyo si Jehova. Dayega ang Dios nga anaa sa iyang balang puluy-anan: Dayega siya diha sa kalangitan sa iyang gahum.
word.hebrew: א  הללו-יה הללו-אל בקדשו    הללוהו ברקיע עזו
word.hebrewmodern: הללו יה הללו אל בקדשו הללוהו ברקיע עזו׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: αλληλουια αἰνεῖτε τὸν θεὸν ἐν τοῖς ἁγίοις αὐτοῦ αἰνεῖτε αὐτὸν ἐν στερεώματι δυνάμεως αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Withhold not good from them to whom it is due, when it is in the power of thine hand to do it.
word.thailand: อย่ายึดความดีไว้จากผู้ที่สมควรจะได้รับ ในเมื่อสิ่งนี้อยู่ในอำนาจมือของเจ้าที่จะกระทำได้
word.spanish1909: No detengas el bien de sus dueños, Cuando tuvieres poder para hacerlo.
word.latinvulgate: Noli prohibere benefacere eum qui potest ; si vales, et ipse benefac.
word.italian1927: Non rifiutare un benefizio a chi vi ha diritto, quand’è in tuo potere di farlo.
word.german1912: Weigere dich nicht, dem Dürftigen Gutes zu tun, so deine Hand von Gott hat, solches zu tun.
word.french1910: Ne refuse pas un bienfait à celui qui y a droit, Quand tu as le pouvoir de l'accorder.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 如果你的手有行善的力量，就不可推辭，要向那些需要幫助的人行善。
word.korean: 네 손이 선을 베풀 힘이 있거든 마땅히 받을 자에게 베풀기를 아끼지 말며
word.tagalog: Huwag mong ikait ang mabuti sa kinauukulan, pagka nasa kapangyarihan ng iyong kamay na ito'y gawin.
word.maori: ¶ Kaua e kaiponuhia te pai ki te hunga i tika nei ma ratou, i nga wa e taea ai e tou ringa.
word.cebuano: Ayaw pag ihikaw ang kaayohan gikan kanila diin kini gikinahanglan, Sa diha nga kini anaa sa gahum sa imong kamot ang pagbuhat niini.
word.hebrew: כז  אל-תמנע-טוב מבעליו--    בהיות לאל ידיך (ידך) לעשות
word.hebrewmodern: אל תמנע טוב מבעליו בהיות לאל ידיך לעשות׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: μὴ ἀπόσχῃ εὖ ποιεῖν ἐνδεῆ ἡνίκα ἂν ἔχῃ ἡ χείρ σου βοηθεῖν

word.kjv: Death and life are in the power of the tongue: and they that love it shall eat the fruit thereof.
word.thailand: ความตายและความเป็นอยู่ที่อำนาจของลิ้น และบรรดาผู้ที่รักมันก็จะกินผลของมัน
word.spanish1909: La muerte y la vida están en poder de la lengua; Y el que la ama comerá de sus frutos.
word.latinvulgate: Mors et vita in manu linguæ ; qui diligunt eam comedent fructus ejus.
word.italian1927: Morte e vita sono in potere della lingua; chi l’ama ne mangerà i frutti.
word.german1912: Tod und Leben steht in der Zunge Gewalt; wer sie liebt, der wird von ihrer Frucht essen.
word.french1910: La mort et la vie sont au pouvoir de la langue; Quiconque l'aime en mangera les fruits.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 生與死都在舌頭的權下；愛把弄這權柄的，必自食其果。
word.korean: 죽고 사는 것이 혀의 권세에 달렸나니 혀를 쓰기 좋아하는 자는 그 열매를 먹으리라
word.tagalog: Kamatayan at buhay ay nasa kapangyarihan ng dila; at ang nagsisiibig sa kaniya ay magsisikain ng kaniyang bunga.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te mate, ko te ora kei te arero: ko te hunga e aroha ana ki tera ka kai i ona hua.
word.cebuano: Kamatayon ug kinabuhi maoy anaa sa gahum sa dila; Ug kadtong mahagugma niini magakaon sa bunga niana.
word.hebrew: כא  מות וחיים ביד-לשון    ואהביה יאכל פריה
word.hebrewmodern: מות וחיים ביד לשון ואהביה יאכל פריה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: θάνατος καὶ ζωὴ ἐν χειρὶ γλώσσης οἱ δὲ κρατοῦντες αὐτῆς ἔδονται τοὺς καρποὺς αὐτῆς

word.kjv: So I returned, and considered all the oppressions that are done under the sun: and behold the tears of such as were oppressed, and they had no comforter; and on the side of their oppressors there was power; but they had no comforter.
word.thailand: ข้าพเจ้าพิจารณาบรรดาการข่มเหงที่เกิดขึ้นภายใต้ดวงอาทิตย์อีก และดูเถิด น้ำตาของผู้ที่ถูกข่มเหง ไม่มีคนเล้าโลมเขา ฝ่ายผู้ข่มเหงเขานั้นกุมอำนาจ แต่หามีผู้ใดเล้าโลมเขาไม่
word.spanish1909: Y TORNÉME yo, y vi todas las violencias que se hacen debajo del sol: y he aquí las lágrimas de los oprimidos, y sin tener quien los consuele; y la fuerza estaba en la mano de sus opresores, y para ellos no había consolador.
word.latinvulgate: Verti me ad alia, et vidi calumnias quæ sub sole geruntur, et lacrimas innocentium, et neminem consolatorem, nec posse resistere eorum violentiæ, cunctorum auxilio destitutos,
word.italian1927: Mi son messo poi a considerare tutte le oppressioni che si commettono sotto il sole; ed ecco, le lacrime degli oppressi, i quali non hanno chi li consoli e dal lato dei loro oppressori la violenza, mentre quelli non hanno chi li consoli.
word.german1912: Ich wandte mich um und sah an alles Unrecht, das geschah unter der Sonne; und siehe, da waren die Tränen derer, so Unrecht litten und hatten keinen Tröster; und die ihnen Unrecht taten, waren zu mächtig, daß sie keinen Tröster haben konnten.
word.french1910: J'ai considéré ensuite toutes les oppressions qui se commettent sous le soleil; et voici, les opprimés sont dans les larmes, et personne qui les console! ils sont en butte à la violence de leurs oppresseurs, et personne qui les console!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 鬥爭勞碌都是虛空我又看見日光之下所發生一切欺壓的事：受欺壓的流淚，卻無人安慰他們；欺壓他們的，手裡握著權柄，因此無人安慰受欺壓的。
word.korean: 내가 돌이켜 해 아래서 행하는 모든 학대를 보았도다 오호라 학대받는 자가 눈물을 흘리되 저희에게 위로자가 없도다 저희를 학대하는 자의 손에는 권세가 있으나 저희에게는 위로자가 없도다
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y pumihit ako, at aking nakita ang lahat na kapighatian na nagawa sa ilalim ng araw: at, narito, ang mga luha ng mga yaon, na napipighati, at wala silang mangaaliw: at sa siping ng mga mamimighati sa kanila ay may kapangyarihan, nguni't wala silang mangaaliw.
word.maori: ¶ Na ka tahuri ahau, a ka titiro ki nga tukinotanga katoa e mahia nei i raro i te ra: na ko nga roimata o te hunga i tukinotia, kahore hoki o ratou kaiwhakamarie; a he kaha kei te ringa o o ratou kaitukino, otiia kahore o ratou kaiwhakamarie.
word.cebuano: Unya ako mipauli ug nakita ko ang tanan nga mga pagdaugdaug nga ginahimo ilalum sa adlaw: ug ania karon, ang luha niadtong mga dinaugdaug, ug sila walay maglilipay, ug niadtong nanagdaugdaug kanila diha ang gahum, apan sila walay maglilipay.
word.hebrew: א ושבתי אני ואראה את כל העשקים אשר נעשים תחת השמש והנה דמעת העשקים ואין להם מנחם ומיד עשקיהם כח ואין להם מנחם
word.hebrewmodern: ושבתי אני ואראה את כל העשקים אשר נעשים תחת השמש והנה דמעת העשקים ואין להם מנחם ומיד עשקיהם כח ואין להם מנחם׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ἐπέστρεψα ἐγὼ καὶ εἶδον σὺν πάσας τὰς συκοφαντίας τὰς γινομένας ὑπὸ τὸν ἥλιον καὶ ἰδοὺ δάκρυον τῶν συκοφαντουμένων καὶ οὐκ ἔστιν αὐτοῖς παρακαλῶν καὶ ἀπὸ χειρὸς συκοφαντούντων αὐτοὺς ἰσχύς καὶ οὐκ ἔστιν αὐτοῖς παρακαλῶν

word.kjv: Every man also to whom God hath given riches and wealth, and hath given him power to eat thereof, and to take his portion, and to rejoice in his labour; this is the gift of God.
word.thailand: อนึ่งทุกๆคนที่พระเจ้าทรงประทานทรัพย์สมบัติและความมั่งคั่งให้ ก็ได้ทรงโปรดให้มีอำนาจรับประทานของเหล่านั้น ได้รับส่วนของตน และยินดีปรีดาในการงานของตนได้ นี่แหละเป็นของประทานจากพระเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Asimismo, á todo hombre á quien Dios dió riquezas y hacienda, y le dió también facultad para que coma de ellas, y tome su parte, y goce su trabajo; esto es don de Dios.
word.latinvulgate: Non enim satis recordabitur dierum vitæ suæ, eo quod Deus occupet deliciis cor ejus.
word.italian1927: E ancora se Dio ha dato a un uomo delle ricchezze e dei tesori, e gli ha dato potere di goderne, di prenderne la sua parte e di gioire della sua fatica, è questo un dono di Dio;
word.german1912: Denn welchem Menschen Gott Reichtum und Güter gibt und die Gewalt, daß er davon ißt und trinkt für sein Teil und fröhlich ist in seiner Arbeit, das ist eine Gottesgabe.
word.french1910: Mais, si Dieu a donné à un homme des richesses et des biens, s'il l'a rendu maître d'en manger, d'en prendre sa part, et de se réjouir au milieu de son travail, c'est là un don de Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 蒙　神賜予財富與資產的人，　神都使他能夠享用，並取自己的分，在勞碌中自得其樂，這是　神的恩賜。
word.korean: 저는 그 생명의 날을 깊이 관념치 아니하리니 이는 하나님이 저의 마음의 기뻐하는 것으로 응하심이라
word.tagalog: Bawa't tao rin naman na binigyan ng Dios ng mga kayamanan at mga pag-aari, at binigyan ng kapangyarihan na kumain niyaon, at kumuha ng kaniyang bahagi, at magalak sa kaniyang gawa, ito'y kaloob ng Dios.
word.maori: Ko nga tangata katoa hoki i homai ai e te Atua he taonga, he rawa, i tukua mai ai ki a ratou te tikanga mo te kai i tetahi wahi o aua mea, mo te tango i te wahi ma ratou, a kia koa ratou i to ratou mauiui; he mea homai tenei na te Atua.
word.cebuano: Ang tagsatagsa ka tawo usab nga gihatagan sa Dios ug mga bahandi ug katigayonan, ug gihatagan siya ug kagahum sa pagkaon gikan niini, ug sa pagkuha sa iyang bahin, ug sa pagkalipay diha sa iyang buhat kini mao ang hatag sa Dios.
word.hebrew: יט כי לא הרבה יזכר את ימי חייו  כי האלהים מענה בשמחת לבו
word.hebrewmodern: גם כל האדם אשר נתן לו האלהים עשר ונכסים והשליטו לאכל ממנו ולשאת את חלקו ולשמח בעמלו זה מתת אלהים היא׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ὅτι οὐ πολλὰ μνησθήσεται τὰς ἡμέρας τῆς ζωῆς αὐτοῦ ὅτι ὁ θεὸς περισπᾷ αὐτὸν ἐν εὐφροσύνῃ καρδίας αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: A man to whom God hath given riches, wealth, and honour, so that he wanteth nothing for his soul of all that he desireth, yet God giveth him not power to eat thereof, but a stranger eateth it: this is vanity, and it is an evil disease.
word.thailand: คือมนุษย์คนใดที่พระเจ้าทรงประทานทรัพย์สมบัติ ความมั่งคั่งและยศฐาบรรดาศักดิ์ให้ จนสิ่งใดๆที่เขาปรารถนาสำหรับตัว จิตใจเขาก็มีครบไม่ขาดเลย แต่พระเจ้ามิได้ทรงโปรดให้เขามีอำนาจรับประทานสิ่งนั้นได้ คนนอกบ้านนอกเมืองกลับรับประทานสิ่งนั้น นี่ก็อนิจจัง และเป็นความทุกข์ใจอย่างร้ายแรง
word.spanish1909: Hombre á quien Dios dió riquezas, y hacienda, y honra, y nada le falta de todo lo que su alma desea; mas Dios no le dió facultad de comer de ello, sino que los extraños se lo comen. Esto vanidad es, y enfermedad trabajosa.
word.latinvulgate: vir cui dedit Deus divitias, et substantiam, et honorem, et nihil deest animæ suæ ex omnibus quæ desiderat ; nec tribuit ei potestatem Deus ut comedat ex eo, sed homo extraneus vorabit illud : hoc vanitas et miseria magna est.
word.italian1927: eccone uno a cui Dio dà ricchezze, tesori e gloria, in guisa che nulla manca all’anima sua di tutto ciò che può desiderare, ma Dio non gli dà il potere di goderne; ne gode uno straniero. Ecco una vanità e un male grave.
word.german1912: einer, dem Gott Reichtum, Güter und Ehre gegeben hat und mangelt ihm keins, das sein Herz begehrt; und Gott gibt doch ihm nicht Macht, es zu genießen, sondern ein anderer verzehrt es; das ist eitel und ein böses Übel.
word.french1910: Il y a tel homme à qui Dieu a donné des richesses, des biens, et de la gloire, et qui ne manque pour son âme de rien de ce qu'il désire, mais que Dieu ne laisse pas maître d'en jouir, car c'est un étranger qui en jouira. C'est là une vanité et un mal grave.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 蒙　神賜予財富、資產和榮譽的人，心裡所願的，都一無所缺，可是　神使他無力享用，反而有外人來享用。這是虛空，也是禍患。
word.korean: 어떤 사람은 그 심령의 모든 소원에 부족함이 없어 재물과 부요와 존귀를 하나님께 받았으나 능히 누리게 하심을 얻지 못하였으므로 다른 사람이 누리나니 이것도 헛되어 악한 병이로다
word.tagalog: Ang tao na binibigyan ng Dios ng mga kayamanan, pag-aari, at karangalan, na anopa't walang kulang sa kaniyang kaluluwa sa lahat niyang ninanasa, gayon ma'y hindi binibigyan siya ng Dios ng kapangyarihan na kumain niyaon, kundi iba ang kumakain niyaon; ito'y walang kabuluhan, at masamang sakit.
word.maori: He tangata i homai nei e te Atua ki a ia he taonga, he rawa, he kororia, a kihai tona wairua i hapa ki tetahi mea i hiahia ai ia, otiia kihai i tukua e te Atua ki a ia te tikanga mo te kai i tetahi wahi o aua mea, engari kainga ana e te tangata k e. He horihori tenei, he mate kino.
word.cebuano: Ang tawo nga ginahatagan sa Dios sa mga katigayonan, kadato, ug kadungganan, sa pagkaagi nga siya dili makulangan alang sa iyang kalag sa tanan niyang gitinguha, apan ang Dios wala maghatag kaniya ug gahum sa pagkaon niini, kondili ang dumuloong maoy mokaon niini; kini maoy kakawangan ug usa ka sakit nga dautan.
word.hebrew: ב איש אשר יתן לו האלהים עשר ונכסים וכבוד ואיננו חסר לנפשו מכל אשר יתאוה ולא ישליטנו האלהים לאכל ממנו--כי איש נכרי יאכלנו  זה הבל וחלי רע הוא
word.hebrewmodern: איש אשר יתן לו האלהים עשר ונכסים וכבוד ואיננו חסר לנפשו מכל אשר יתאוה ולא ישליטנו האלהים לאכל ממנו כי איש נכרי יאכלנו זה הבל וחלי רע הוא׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἀνήρ ᾧ δώσει αὐτῷ ὁ θεὸς πλοῦτον καὶ ὑπάρχοντα καὶ δόξαν καὶ οὐκ ἔστιν ὑστερῶν τῇ ψυχῇ αὐτοῦ ἀπὸ πάντων ὧν ἐπιθυμήσει καὶ οὐκ ἐξουσιάσει αὐτῷ ὁ θεὸς τοῦ φαγεῖν ἀπ' αὐτοῦ ὅτι ἀνὴρ ξένος φάγεται αὐτόν τοῦτο ματαιότης καὶ ἀρρωστία πονηρά ἐστιν

word.kjv: Where the word of a king is, there is power: and who may say unto him, What doest thou?
word.thailand: ด้วยว่าพระดำรัสของกษัตริย์อยู่ที่ไหน อำนาจก็อยู่ที่นั่น และใครผู้ใดจะกราบทูลถามพระองค์ได้ว่า "พระองค์ทรงกระทำอะไรเช่นนั้น"
word.spanish1909: Pues la palabra del rey es con potestad, ¿y quién le dirá, Qué haces?
word.latinvulgate: Et sermo illius potestate plenus est, nec dicere ei quisquam potest : Quare ita facis ?
word.italian1927: perché la parola del re è potente; e chi gli può dire: "Che fai?"
word.german1912: In des Königs Wort ist Gewalt; und wer mag zu ihm sagen: Was machst du?
word.french1910: parce que la parole du roi est puissante; et qui lui dira: Que fais-tu?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 既然王的話有權柄，誰敢問他：“你在作甚麼？”
word.korean: 왕의 말은 권능이 있나니 누가 이르기를 왕께서 무엇을 하시나이까 할 수 있으랴
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang salita ng hari ay may kapangyarihan; at sinong makapagsasabi sa kaniya, Anong ginagawa mo?
word.maori: No te mea he mana to te kupu a te kingi; a ko wai hei mea atu ki a ia, E aha ana koe?
word.cebuano: Kay ang pulong sa hari adunay gahum: ug kinsa ang moingon kaniya: Unsa ba ang imong ginabuhat?
word.hebrew: ד באשר דבר מלך שלטון ומי יאמר לו מה תעשה
word.hebrewmodern: באשר דבר מלך שלטון ומי יאמר לו מה תעשה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καθὼς λαλεῖ βασιλεὺς ἐξουσιάζων καὶ τίς ἐρεῖ αὐτῷ τί ποιήσεις

word.kjv: There is no man that hath power over the spirit to retain the spirit; neither hath he power in the day of death: and there is no discharge in that war; neither shall wickedness deliver those that are given to it.
word.thailand: หามีมนุษย์คนใดมีอำนาจเหนือจิตวิญญาณที่จะรั้งจิตวิญญาณได้ไม่ หรือหามีอำนาจอันใดเหนือวันตายไม่ การสงครามนั้นย่อมไม่มีการปลดปล่อย ความชั่วร้ายย่อมไม่มีการปลดปล่อยผู้ที่ถูกมอบให้ไว้
word.spanish1909: No hay hombre que tenga potestad sobre el espíritu para retener el espíritu, ni potestad sobre el día de la muerte: y no valen armas en tal guerra; ni la impiedad librará al que la posee.
word.latinvulgate: Non est in hominis potestate prohibere spiritum, nec habet potestatem in die mortis : nec sinitur quiescere ingruente bello, neque salvabit impietas impium.
word.italian1927: Non v’è uomo che abbia potere sul vento per poterlo trattenere, o che abbia potere sul giorno della morte; non v’è congedo in tempo di guerra, e l’iniquità non può salvare chi la commette.
word.german1912: Ein Mensch hat nicht Macht über den Geist, den Geist zurückzuhalten, und hat nicht Macht über den Tag des Todes, und keiner wird losgelassen im Streit; und das gottlose Wesen errettet den Gottlosen nicht.
word.french1910: L'homme n'est pas maître de son souffle pour pouvoir le retenir, et il n'a aucune puissance sur le jour de la mort; il n'y a point de délivrance dans ce combat, et la méchanceté ne saurait sauver les méchants.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 沒有人能支配風（“風”或譯：“生命”），把它留住；沒有人能控制死期；戰爭之時，沒有人能免役；邪惡救不了行邪惡的人。
word.korean: 생기를 주장하여 생기로 머무르게할 사람도 없고 죽는 날을 주장할 자도 없고 전쟁할 때에 모면할 자도 없으며 악이 행악자를 건져낼 수도 없느니라
word.tagalog: Walang tao na may kapangyarihan sa diwa upang pumigil ng diwa; ni walang kapangyarihan siya sa kaarawan ng kamatayan; at walang dahilan sa pakikipagpunyaging yaon: ni maililigtas siya ng kasamaan, na taglay niya.
word.maori: Kahore he tangata e whai mana ana ki te wairua, ki te pupuri i te wairua; kahore hoki he mana ki te ra o te mate: i taua pakanga hoki e kore tetahi e tukua atu; e kore ano te kino e whakaora i te mea e tukua atu ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Walay tawo nga may gahum sa espiritu aron sa pagpugong sa espiritu; ni may gahum siya sa pagbuot sa adlaw sa kamatayon: ug walay pagsibug sa gubat; ni ang kadautan magaluwas niadtong naanad niini.
word.hebrew: ח אין אדם שליט ברוח לכלוא את הרוח ואין שלטון ביום המות ואין משלחת במלחמה ולא ימלט רשע את בעליו
word.hebrewmodern: אין אדם שליט ברוח לכלוא את הרוח ואין שלטון ביום המות ואין משלחת במלחמה ולא ימלט רשע את בעליו׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: οὐκ ἔστιν ἄνθρωπος ἐξουσιάζων ἐν πνεύματι τοῦ κωλῦσαι σὺν τὸ πνεῦμα καὶ οὐκ ἔστιν ἐξουσία ἐν ἡμέρᾳ τοῦ θανάτου καὶ οὐκ ἔστιν ἀποστολὴ ἐν τῷ πολέμῳ καὶ οὐ διασώσει ἀσέβεια τὸν παρ' αὐτῆς

word.kjv: Therefore their inhabitants were of small power, they were dismayed and confounded: they were as the grass of the field, and as the green herb, as the grass on the housetops, and as corn blasted before it be grown up.
word.thailand: ส่วนชาวเมืองนั้นมีอำนาจน้อย เขาสะดุ้งกลัวและอับอาย เขาเหมือนหญ้าที่ทุ่งนา และเหมือนหญ้าอ่อน เหมือนหญ้าที่บนยอดหลังคาเรือน เหมือนข้าวเกรียมไปก่อนที่มันจะงอกงามอย่างนั้น
word.spanish1909: Y sus moradores, cortos de manos, quebrantados y confusos, serán como grama del campo y hortaliza verde, como hierba de los tejados, que antes de sazón se seca.
word.latinvulgate: Habitatores earum breviata manu contremuerunt, et confusi sunt. Facti sunt sicut fœnum agri, et gramen pascuæ, et herba tectorum, quæ exaruit antequam maturesceret.
word.italian1927: I loro abitanti, ridotti all’impotenza, sono smarriti e confusi; sono come l’erba de’ campi, come la tenera verdura, come l’erba dei tetti, come grano riarso prima di spigare.
word.german1912: und ihre Einwohner schwach und zaghaft werden und mit Schanden bestehen und werden wie das Feldgras und wie das grüne Kraut, wie Gras auf den Dächern, welches verdorrt, ehe es denn reif wird.
word.french1910: Leurs habitants sont impuissants, Epouvantés et confus; Ils sont comme l'herbe des champs et la tendre verdure, Comme le gazon des toits Et le blé qui sèche avant la formation de sa tige.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因此，其中的居民軟弱無力，驚惶羞愧，像田間的蔬菜和青綠的草，又像房頂上的草，還沒有長起來，就乾焦了。
word.korean: 네 거처와 네 출입과 나를 거스려 분노함을 내가 아노라
word.tagalog: Kaya't ang kanilang mga mananahan ay may munting kapangyarihan, sila'y nanganglupaypay at nangatulig; sila'y parang damo sa bukid, at sariwang gugulayin, parang damo sa mga bubungan, at parang bukid ng trigo bago tumaas.
word.maori: Koia i iti ai te kaha o o reira tangata; wehi ana ratou, porahurahu kau ana; rite tonu ki te tarutaru o te parae, ki te otaota matomato, ki te taru i runga i nga tuanui, ki te witi i ngingio i te mea kiano i tupu noa.
word.cebuano: Busa ang ilang mga pumoluyo may diyutay nga gahum, nangaluya ug nangagubot; sila sama sa balili sa kapatagan ug sama sa malunhaw nga bunglayon, sama sa balili sa mga atop sa balay, ug sama sa usa ka uma sa liso nga nalaya sa wala pa makatubo.
word.hebrew: כז וישביהן קצרי יד חתו ובשו היו עשב שדה וירק דשא חציר גגות ושדמה לפני קמה
word.hebrewmodern: וישביהן קצרי יד חתו ובשו היו עשב שדה וירק דשא חציר גגות ושדמה לפני קמה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἀνῆκα τὰς χεῖρας καὶ ἐξηράνθησαν καὶ ἐγένοντο ὡς χόρτος ξηρὸς ἐπὶ δωμάτων καὶ ὡς ἄγρωστις

word.kjv: Lift up your eyes on high, and behold who hath created these things, that bringeth out their host by number: he calleth them all by names by the greatness of his might, for that he is strong in power; not one faileth.
word.thailand: จงแหงนหน้าขึ้นดูว่า ผู้ใดสร้างสิ่งเหล่านี้ พระองค์ผู้ทรงนำบริวารออกมาตามจำนวน เรียกชื่อมันทั้งหมดโดยอานุภาพอันยิ่งใหญ่ของพระองค์ และเพราะพระองค์ทรงฤทธิ์เข้มแข็งจึงไม่ขาดไปสักดวงเดียว
word.spanish1909: Levantad en alto vuestros ojos, y mirad quién crió estas cosas: él saca por cuenta su ejército: á todas llama por sus nombres; ninguna faltará: tal es la grandeza de su fuerza, y su poder y virtud.
word.latinvulgate: Levate in excelsum oculos vestros, et videte quis creavit hæc ; qui educit in numero militiam eorum, et omnes ex nomine vocat ; præ multitudine fortitudinis et roboris, virtutisque ejus, neque unum reliquum fuit.
word.italian1927: Levate gli occhi in alto, e guardate: Chi ha create queste cose? Colui che fa uscir fuori, e conta il loro esercito, che le chiama tutte per nome; e per la grandezza del suo potere e per la potenza della sua forza, non una manca.
word.german1912: Hebet eure Augen in die Höhe und sehet! Wer hat solche Dinge geschaffen und führt ihr Heer bei der Zahl heraus? Er ruft sie alle mit Namen; sein Vermögen und seine Kraft ist so groß, daß es nicht an einem fehlen kann. {~}
word.french1910: Levez vos yeux en haut, et regardez! Qui a créé ces choses? Qui fait marcher en ordre leur armée? Il les appelle toutes par leur nom; Par son grand pouvoir et par sa force puissante, Il n'en est pas une qui fasse défaut.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們向天舉目吧！看是誰創造了這些萬象？是誰按著數目把萬象領出來，一一指名呼喚？因他的大能大力，連一個也不缺少。
word.korean: 너희는 눈을 높이 들어 누가 이 모든 것을 창조하였나보라 주께서는 수효대로 만상을 이끌어 내시고 각각 그 이름을 부르시나니 그의 권세가 크고 그의 능력이 강하므로 하나도 빠짐이 없느니라
word.tagalog: Itingin ninyo ang inyong mga mata sa itaas, at tingnan ninyo kung sinong lumikha ng mga ito, na tinutuos ang kanilang hukbo ayon sa bilang; tinatawag niya sila sa pangalan; sa pamamagitan ng kadakilaan ng kaniyang kapangyarihan, at dahil sa siya'y malakas sa kapangyarihan ay walang nagkukulang.
word.maori: E ara o koutou kanohi ki runga titiro ai, na wai enei mea i hanga, na wai o ratou mano i whakaputa mai he mea tatau tonu: karangatia ana e ia nga ingoa o ratou katoa, maroro rawa, pakari tonu te kaha; e kore tetahi e ngaro.
word.cebuano: Ihangad ang inyong mga mata sa itaas, ug tan-awa kong kinsay nagbuhat niini, nga nagadala sa ilang panon sa tinagdaghan; siya nagatawag kanilang tanan pinaagi sa ngalan; tungod sa kadaku sa iyang gahum, ug tungod kay siya kusgan sa kagahum, walay mausa nga makulang kanila .
word.hebrew: כו שאו מרום עיניכם וראו מי ברא אלה המוציא במספר צבאם לכלם בשם יקרא מרב אונים ואמיץ כח איש לא נעדר  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: שאו מרום עיניכם וראו מי ברא אלה המוציא במספר צבאם לכלם בשם יקרא מרב אונים ואמיץ כח איש לא נעדר׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἀναβλέψατε εἰς ὕψος τοὺς ὀφθαλμοὺς ὑμῶν καὶ ἴδετε τίς κατέδειξεν πάντα ταῦτα ὁ ἐκφέρων κατὰ ἀριθμὸν τὸν κόσμον αὐτοῦ πάντας ἐπ' ὀνόματι καλέσει ἀπὸ πολλῆς δόξης καὶ ἐν κράτει ἰσχύος οὐδέν σε ἔλαθεν

word.kjv: He giveth power to the faint; and to them that have no might he increaseth strength.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงประทานกำลังแก่คนอ่อนเปลี้ย และแก่ผู้ที่ไม่มีกำลัง พระองค์ทรงเพิ่มแรง
word.spanish1909: El da esfuerzo al cansado, y multiplica las fuerzas al que no tiene ningunas.
word.latinvulgate: Qui dat lasso virtutem, et his qui non sunt fortitudinem et robur multiplicat.
word.italian1927: Egli dà forza allo stanco, e accresce vigore a colui ch’è spossato.
word.german1912: Er gibt den Müden Kraft, und Stärke genug dem Unvermögenden.
word.french1910: Il donne de la force à celui qui est fatigué, Et il augmente la vigueur de celui qui tombe en défaillance.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 疲乏的，他賜氣力，無力的，他加力量。
word.korean: 피곤한 자에게는 능력을 주시며 무능한 자에게는 힘을 더하시나니

word.spanish1909: El que saca carro y caballo, ejército y fuerza; caen juntamente para no levantarse; quedan extinguidos, como pábilo quedan apagados.
word.latinvulgate: qui eduxit quadrigam et equum, agmen et robustum ; simul obdormierunt, nec resurgent ; contriti sunt quasi linum, et extincti sunt.
word.italian1927: che fece uscire carri e cavalli, un esercito di prodi guerrieri; e tutti quanti furono atterrati, né più si rialzarono; furono estinti, spenti come un lucignolo.
word.german1912: der ausziehen läßt Wagen und Roß, Heer und Macht, daß sie auf einem Haufen daliegen und nicht aufstehen, daß sie verlöschen, wie ein Docht verlischt:
word.french1910: Qui mit en campagne des chars et des chevaux, Une armée et de vaillants guerriers, Soudain couchés ensemble, pour ne plus se relever, Anéantis, éteints comme une mèche:

word.korean: 병거와 말과 군대의 용사를 이끌어 내어서 그들로 일시에 엎드러져 일지 못하고 소멸하기를 꺼져가는 등불 같게 한 나 여호와가 말하노라

word.kjv: Behold, they shall be as stubble; the fire shall burn them; they shall not deliver themselves from the power of the flame: there shall not be a coal to warm at, nor fire to sit before it.
word.thailand: ดูเถิด เขาจะเป็นเหมือนตอข้าว ไฟจะเผาผลาญเขา เขาจะช่วยตัวเขาเองให้พ้นจากกำลังของเปลวเพลิงไม่ได้ นี่ไม่ใช่ถ่านที่จะให้ใครอุ่น ไม่ใช่ไฟที่จะให้ใครผิง
word.spanish1909: He aquí que serán como tamo; fuego los quemará, no salvarán sus vidas del poder de la llama; no quedará brasa para calentarse, ni lumbre á la cual se sienten.
word.latinvulgate: Ecce facti sunt quasi stipula, ignis combussit eos ; non liberabunt animam suam de manu flammæ ; non sunt prunæ quibus calefiant, nec focus ut sedeant ad eum.
word.italian1927: Ecco, essi sono come stoppia, il fuoco li consuma; non salveranno la loro vita dalla violenza della fiamma; non ne rimarrà brace a cui scaldarsi, né fuoco dinanzi al quale sedersi.
word.german1912: Siehe, sie sind wie Stoppeln, die das Feuer verbrennt; sie können ihr Leben nicht erretten vor der Flamme; denn es wird nicht eine Glut sein, dabei man sich wärme, oder ein Feuer, darum man sitzen möge. {~}
word.french1910: Voici, ils sont comme de la paille, le feu les consume, Ils ne sauveront pas leur vie des flammes: Ce ne sera pas du charbon dont on se chauffe, Ni un feu auprès duquel on s'assied.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 看哪！他們必像碎秸，火必要焚燒他們；他們不能救自己脫離火燄的威力；這不是可以烤火取暖的火炭，也不是可以坐在它面前的火。
word.korean: 보라 그들은 초개 같아서 불에 타리니 그 불꽃의 세력에서 스스로 구원치 못할 것이라 이 불은 더웁게 할 숯불이 아니요 그 앞에 앉을 만한 불도 아니니라
word.tagalog: Narito, sila'y magiging gaya ng pinagputulan ng trigo; susunugin sila ng apoy; sila'y hindi makaliligtas sa bangis ng liyab: hindi babaga na mapagpapainitan, o magiging apoy na mauupuan sa harap.
word.maori: Nana, ka rite ratou ki te kakau witi, ka wera i te ahi; e kore ratou e ora i te ngaunga a te ahi: ehara i te ngarahu hei whakamahanatanga, ehara hoki i te ahi hei painatanga.
word.cebuano: Ania karon, sila mahisama sa mga tuod sa balili; ang kalayo magasunog kanila; sila dili makaluwas sa ilang kaugalingon gikan sa gahum sa siga: kini dili man mausa ka baga nga arang pagadangkahan, ni kalayo aron alirongan.
